title: अमेरिकी डलर स्थिर रहँदा युरो बढ्यो पाउण्ड घट्यो, यस्तो छ आजको विनिमय दर
creator: Bhim Ghimire
content: काठमाडौं। अमेरिकी डलरको विनिमय दर स्थिर रहँदा युरोपियन युरो बढेको छ भने पाउण्ड स्टर्लिङ घटेको छ। स्वीडिश क्रोनरको मूल्यमा झिनो बढोत्तरी छ भने बहरेन दिनार र ओमानी रियाल स्थिर छन्।नेपाल राष्ट्र बैंकका अनुसार शनिबार र आइतबार १ अमेरिकी डलरको खरिद दर १३९ रुपैयाँ ७९ पैसा र बिक्री दर १४० रुपैयाँ ३९ पैसा छ। यो विनिमय दर अघिल्लो दिनका तुलनामा बढेर शुक्रबार कायम भएको हो। गत बिहीबार खरिद दर १३९ रुपैयाँ ६१ पैसा र बिक्री दर १४० रुपैयाँ २१ पैसा थियो।युरोपियन युरोको खरिद दर १६३ रुपैयाँ ३९ पैसा र बिक्री दर १६४ रुपैयाँ ९ पैसा भएको छ। गत शुक्रबार खरिद दर १६३ रुपैयाँ ३५ पैसा र बिक्री दर १६४ रुपैयाँ ५ पैसा थियो।पाउण्ड स्टर्लिङको खरिद दर १८९ रुपैयाँ ५७ पैसा र बिक्री दर १९० रुपैयाँ ३८ पैसा भएको छ। गत शुक्रबार खरिद दर १८९ रुपैयाँ ८२ पैसा र बिक्री दर १९० रुपैयाँ ६४ पैसा थियो। स्वीस फ्रयांकको खरिद दर बढेर १७३ रुपैयाँ ४७ पैसा र बिक्री दर १७४ रुपैयाँ २१ पैसा भएको छ। गत शुक्रबार खरिद दर १७३ रुपैयाँ ४५ पैसा र बिक्री दर १७४ रुपैयाँ १९ पैसा थियो।अष्ट्रेलियन डलर घटेर खरिद दर ९१ रुपैयाँ ५ पैसा र बिक्री दर ९१ रुपैयाँ ४४ पैसा भएको छ। गत शुक्रबार खरिद दर ९१ रुपैयाँ २१ पैसा र बिक्री दर ९१ रुपैयाँ ६० पैसा पुगेको थियो।स्वीडिश क्रोनरको खरिद दर १४ रुपैयाँ ६२ पैसा र बिक्री दर १४ रुपैयाँ ६९ पैसा भएको छ। गत शुक्रबार खरिद दर १४ रुपैयाँ ६१ पैसा र बिक्री दर १४ रुपैयाँ ६७ पैसा थियो।आजको विनिमय दरमुद्राएकाइखरिद दरबिक्री दरभारतीय रुपैयाँ१००१६०.००१६०.१५अमेरिकी डलर११३९.७९१४०.३९युरोपियन युरो११६३.३९१६४.०९पाउण्ड स्टर्लिङ११८९.५७१९०.३८स्वीस फ्रयांक११७३.४७१७४.२१अष्ट्रेलियन डलर१९१.०५९१.४४क्यानेडियन डलर११०१.३७१०१.८०सिंगापुर...

title: Education key to India to becoming a developed nation: VIT Chancellor
creator: The Hans India
content: �Vellore: Vellore Institute of Technology (VIT), Chancellor Dr. G. Viswanathan said that the transformative role of education in shaping India’s future. Addressing thousands of graduates, on the eve of VIT’s 40th Convocation on Friday, he emphasized that India’s aspiration to become a developed nation by 2047 hinges on robust investment and reform in the education sector.The ceremony, held at VIT’s Vellore campus, was attended by distinguished guests including Supreme Court Justice R. Mahadevan, who served as the chief guest and conferred degrees upon the graduating students. A total of 11,563 students were honored—8,310 with undergraduate degrees, 2,802 with postgraduate degrees, and 451 with doctoral degrees. Among them, 203 students were recognized for academic rankings and 68 received gold medals for outstanding performance. Tamil Nadu Police Academy Director DGP Sandeep Rai Rathore was conferred a Ph.D. in Disaster Management. Sivakumar Sundaram, CEO of The Times of India, also graced the occasion as guest of honor. In a symbolic tribute to India’s scientific legacy, student hostels named after Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam and Jagadish Chandra Bose were inaugurated during the event. In his keynote address, Dr. Viswanathan reiterated the long-standing demand to allocate 6% of India’s GDP to education, lamenting that only 3% is currently spent. “State governments shoulder 75% of the education expenditure, while the central government contributes the rest. Tamil Nadu leads the...

title: 인천시, 제43회 문화상 주인공 찾는다...18일부터 접수
creator: 함상환 기자
content: [인천=뉴시스] 함상환 기자 = 인천시는 향토 문화예술 진흥과 지역사회 발전에 큰 공적이 있는 시민을 시상하는 제43회 문화상 후보자 추천을 8월 18일부터 9월 26일까지 접수한다고 17일 밝혔다. 문화상은 학술, 문학, 미술, 공연예술, 전통예술, 문화콘텐츠, 관광, 체육, 언론 등 총 9개 부문에서 시상한다. 추천권자는 인천시장 ▲각 부문별 관련단체 및 기관의 장 ▲전문대학 이상의 총·학장 ▲교육감 및 군수·구청장 ▲인천시민 50인 이상(연서)이다. 수상 자격은 시상 부문에서 탁월한 공적을 세워 향토 문화예술 발전에 크게 기여하고 공고일 현재 인천시에 3년 이상 계속 거주한 자이거나, 타 지역 활동을 통해 인천을 널리 알린 공적이 있으며 인천시에 3년 이상 거주한 사람이다. 또 시·도 단위 이상의 문화상 수상 경력이 없어야 한다. 추천 시에는 추천서와 공적조서, 이력서, 기타 공적 증빙자료 등을 제출해야 하며, 접수는 8월 18일부터 9월 26일까지 시 문화정책과 방문 또는 우편으로 가능하다. 접수 마감 후 11월 중 각 부문별 전문가로 구성된 분과위원회에서 1차 심사를 거쳐 심사위원회에서 최종 수상자를 선정할 계획이며 수상자는 12월 초 개별 통보되며, 시상식은 12월 중 개최된다. 윤도영 시 문화체육국장은 “제43회 문화상은 인천의 문화예술 위상을 높이는 데 크게 기여한 분들께 드리는 뜻깊은 상”이라며, “지역사회 곳곳의 숨은 공로자들이 널리 추천될 수 있도록 시민 여러분의 많은 관심과 홍보를...

title: गुरुग्राम: पैसों के विवाद में युवक की हत्या... पुलिस ने दो को किया गिरफ्तार
creator: aajtak.in
content: गुरुग्राम में एक 38 वर्षीय व्यक्ति की हत्या मामले में गुरुग्राम पुलिस ने शनिवार को पैसों के विवाद में अपहरण और हत्या के सिलसिले में दो लोगों को गिरफ्तार किया है. इस बात की जानकारी एक पुलिस अधिकारी ने एक न्यूज एजेंसी को दी. पुलिस ने बताया कि गुरुग्राम के धर्म कॉलोनी निवासी आरोपी प्रवीण राणा (30) का अजय से विवाद था, जिसने राणा से 30,000 रुपये उधार लिए थे. यह रकम वसूलने के लिए राणा अपने साथी आर्यन (19), उत्तर प्रदेश के शामली निवासी के साथ बुधवार को सेक्टर 113 गया. जहां तिवारी एक निजी कंपनी में पेंट्री बॉय के रूप में काम करता था. वहां उन्होंने उसे जबरन अपनी कार में बिठाया और उसकी पिटाई शुरू कर दी. जिसके बाद तिवारी पर पैसे वापस करने का दबाव बनाया. यह भी पढ़ें: रेवाड़ी में मर्डर के आरोपी को घाघरा पहनाकर बाजार में घुमाया, बर्थडे मर्डर केस में था फरार भागने के चक्कर में चलती कार से कूद गया था पीड़ित गुरुग्राम पुलिस प्रवक्ता ने बताया कि भागने की कोशिश में तिवारी चलती कार से कूद गया और उसके सिर में चोटें आईं. उसे गंभीर हालत में आरोपी छोड़कर फरार हो गए. जिससे उसकी मौत हो गई. यह भी पढ़ें: 35 साल पुराने कश्मीरी पंडित नर्स सरला भट्ट के मर्डर केस में यासीन मलिक के घर रेड, श्रीनगर में 8 ठिकानों पर SIA की दबिश पीड़ित की पत्नी द्वारा दर्ज कराई गई शिकायत के अनुसार तिवारी की शुक्रवार को एक अस्पताल में मृत्यु हो गई. ऐसे में एफआईआर में हत्या की धारा जोड़ दी गई. फिलहाल मामले में आरोपियों से पूछताछ की जा रही है.

title: В Бурятии задержали стрелявшего в магазине из пневматического оружия мужчину
content: УЛАН-УДЭ, 17 августа. /ТАСС/. Сотрудники полиции задержали мужчину, открывшего стрельбу из пневматического оружия в ходе конфликта между посетителями магазина. Об этом сообщили в МВД по Бурятии. "Вчера вечером в Железнодорожном районе между посетителями одного из магазинов произошел конфликт. В результате ссоры произошла потасовка, в ходе которой один из мужчин пневматическим пистолетом нанес два ранения оппоненту, после чего скрылся с места происшествия. Пострадавший доставлен в медицинское учреждение. В настоящее время сотрудниками полиции мужчина 1982 года рождения задержан", - говорится в сообщении. Пневматический пистолет изъят. Устанавливаются обстоятельства происшествия, проводится проверка.

title: States move to send hundreds of National Guard members to Washington
creator: MATT BROWN Associated Press
content: WASHINGTON -- Three states moved to deploy hundreds of members of their National Guard to the nation’s capital as part of the Trump administration’s effort to overhaul policing in Washington through a federal crackdown on crime and homelessness. West Virginia said it was deploying 300 to 400 Guard troops, while South Carolina pledged 200 and Ohio says it will send 150 in the coming days. The moves announced Saturday came as protesters pushed back on federal law enforcement and National Guard troops fanning out in the heavily Democratic city following President Donald Trump's executive order federalizing local police forces and activating about 800 District of Columbia National Guard members. By adding outside troops to join the existing Guard deployment and federal law enforcement officers, Trump is exercising even tighter control over the city. It’s a power play that the president has justified as an emergency response to crime and homelessness, even though city officials have noted that violent crime is lower than it was during Trump’s first term in office. So far, National Guard members have played a limited role in law enforcement in D.C. and it’s unclear why additional troops are needed. They have been seen patrolling at landmarks like the National Mall and Union Station and assisting with crowd control. A protest against Trump’s intervention drew scores to Dupont Circle on Saturday before a march to the White House, about 1.5 miles away. Demonstrators assembled behind...

title: Autoridades aseguran arsenal y droga en golpes al crimen organizado
creator: La Jornada
content: Ciudad de México.– En dos operativos distintos, fuerzas federales asestaron golpes a grupos delictivos al asegurar precursores de metanfetamina, armas y miles de cartuchos, además de detener a dos personas.En el primer caso, la Secretaría de Marina (Semar), en coordinación con la Aduana de Manzanillo, incautó 114 litros de presunto precursor de metanfetamina en el Recinto Portuario de Colima. La sustancia, que procedía de Michoacán, estaba oculta en 30 galones de plástico distribuidos en cinco cajas de cartón.Aseguramiento de Armas y Detenciones en SinaloaPor otra parte, en operativos conjuntos entre la Semar, el Ejército Mexicano, la Guardia Nacional y otras corporaciones, se desmanteló un campamento delictivo en los municipios de Navolato y San Ignacio, Sinaloa.Como resultado de los recorridos terrestres y aéreos, las autoridades lograron asegurar 6,698 cartuchos útiles, cinco armas de fuego, 49 uniformes camuflados y un artefacto explosivo improvisado. En el lugar, se detuvo a dos civiles que quedaron a disposición del Ministerio Público Federal.

title: German, French, UK leaders still to decide on their trip to US for meeting with Zelensky
creator: TASS
content: BERLIN, August 17. /TASS/. The governments of German Chancellor Friedrich Merz, French President Emmanuel Macron and British Prime Minister Keir Starmer plan to decide on August 17 whether their leaders would be travelling to the United States for a meeting between US President Donald Trump and Ukraine’s Vladimir Zelensky, Germany’s Bild daily reported. According to Bild, the governments of Merz, Starmer and Macron intend on Sunday, August 17, to coordinate their actions and jointly decide whether who would exactly be travelling to the United States on August 18 fro Trump's meeting with Zelensky. However, such a decision requires an official invitation on behalf of the United States, according to Bild. The daily reported that US President Trump offered Zelensky to invite European politicians to the United States, however, there were no official invitations extended as of yet. Bild added that European leaders seek to avoid a meeting intended solely for publicity. AFP reported earlier citing the Elysee Palace that the `coalition of the willing’ will convene a meeting via video link on August 17. British Prime Minister Keir Starmer, German Chancellor Friedrich Merz, and French President Emmanuel Macron, who earlier announced that the members of the coalition will hold a conversation soon without disclosing the date, will get together for an online conversation at 3:00 p.m. local time (1:00 p.m. GMT) on Sunday. The three leaders will discuss "next steps as part of the discussion...

title: 인천시, 18~21일 ‘2025년 을지연습’...60여개 기관·3800여 명 참가
creator: 함상환 기자
content: [인천=뉴시스] 함상환 기자 = 인천시는 18~21일까지 인천시청 을지연습장에서 ‘2025년 을지연습’을 실시한다고 17일 밝혔다. 이번 연습에는 인천시를 비롯해 시 산하기관, 유관기관, 군부대, 경찰, 소방, 중점관리대상업체, 다중이용시설 등 60여 개 기관 및 업체에서 3800여 명이 참여한다. 을지연습은 전시, 사변 또는 이에 준하는 국가 비상사태 발생 시 시민의 생명과 재산을 보호하기 위해 매년 실시되는 비상대비 연습이다. 이를 통해 비상대비계획을 점검·보완하고 전시 임무 수행 절차를 숙달하게 된다. 연습 첫날인 18일에는 전 공무원을 대상으로 비상소집 훈련이 진행되어 공무원 소집태세와 비상 전파체계 등을 점검한다. 또 전시 직제 편성을 통한 개인 임무 고지 및 전시 창설기구 훈련도 병행해 실시할 예정이다. 이어 20일까지는 전시 상황에 따른 각 실·국별 현안과제를 토의하고, 기관별 비상대비계획을 면밀히 검토하여 보완점을 도출할 계획이다. 특히, 20일 오후 2시에는 선학체육관에서 인천시와 연수구 주관으로 민·관·군·경이 함께 참여하는 ‘서해5도 출도주민 수용·구호’ 실제훈련이 진행된다. 이 훈련은 국지도발 등 비상상황 발생 시 섬 지역 주민들을 안전하게 임시구호시설로 이동시키고 구호하는 전 과정을 실전처럼 훈련함으로써 자치단체의 수용·구호 역량을 강화하는 데 목적이 있다. 유정복 시장은 연습 첫날 종합상황실에서 열린 최초 상황보고회에서 “을지연습은 국가 비상대비 태세를...

title: En Cruz Azul se entregan títulos: afición de la Máquina pone ‘contra las cuerdas’ a Larcamón
creator: Pablo Sánchez
content: La relación entre la afición de Cruz Azul y Nicolás Larcamón se afectó luego del 7-0. Los fanáticos del conjunto celeste siguen descontentos luego de que La Máquina tuviera un fracaso rotundo durante su participación en la Leagues Cup, pero no revocan el voto de confianza a su técnico. El desempeño del equipo bajo el mando del estratega argentino no ha sido el esperado y los seguidores esperan que se redima en el Apertura 2025 con el título.TAL VEZ TE INTERESE: “Es el mejor defensa”: Afición de Cruz Azul ruega a Gonzalo Piovi que no se vayaCruz Azul quedó eliminado de la Leagues Cup casi desde la primera jornada de fase de grupos. El cuadro de La Noria inició su participación en el certamen entre la Liga MX y la MLS ante el Seattle Sounders en un duelo que pareció parejo durante el primer tiempo, pero después se transformó en una pesadilla para Nicolás Larcamón y sus jugadores, pues recibieron 7 tantos en menos de 45 minutos. Ver esta publicación en Instagram Una publicación compartida de ESTO (@estoenlinea)“Es un proceso que empieza, si dijeras que viene con experiencia antes, no habría perdón. Está empezando y creo que sí podríamos darle chance de que continúe sin problema”, aseguró Fernando Naranjo para ESTO. “Yo también creo que sí, todos merecen segundas oportunidades y apenas empieza Larcamón”, añadió Frida.Afición de Cruz Azul exige resultados para Nicolás Larcamón La derrota de Cruz Azul ante el equipo estadounidense manchó la...

title: Historic outback pub pouring beers again after 60 years
creator: Kerry Staight
content: Wander around the remote Flinders Ranges township of Beltana in the early hours and "ghost town" comes to mind. But when Jan Ferguson walks out of the 1870s Royal Victoria Hotel with an "open" sign, it's clear this town isn't ready to be consigned to history. "There are 30 people who live here. If everybody was here in their holiday houses, that would grow to 65. Ms Ferguson serves patrons inside the newly reopened Royal Victoria Hotel in Beltana. "It's managed to survive, you know, where a lot of towns like this haven't." Jan and her husband Chris Ferguson are at the centre of Beltana's latest revival story, the South Australian town which lies 540 kilometres north of Adelaide. Couple's decades-long connection to pub More than 65 years after the Royal Victoria Hotel served last drinks, it's reopened its doors after the retired couple, who met in Beltana in the 1970s, bought and revived the pub with the help of family. "We've always had a passion for the hotel," Ms Ferguson said. The Fergusons are behind the recently restored bar at the Royal Victoria Hotel. The historic Royal Victoria Hotel in Beltana has been restored and reopened after more than 60 years. While the hotel was used as a home in the 1990s, it still took two and a half years to bring the main rooms back to their former glory and install modern amenities. "We've done seven of the 17 rooms, so there's a lot to go, and we had to open it up as a hotel to bring some money back in," Ms Ferguson said. The Royal...

title: City celebrates ‘Krishnashtami’ with devotional fervour
creator: The Hans India
content: Visakhapatnam: The city soaked in festive spirit as Krishna temples celebrated Sri Krishna Janmashtami organising various events for close to three days consecutively in Visakhapatnam.ISKCON celebrated Sri Krishna Janmashtami with great pomp at the ISKCON temple in Sagar Nagar, Visakhapatnam. As part of the second day of the festivities, mangala aarti, chanting of Harinama, Annamayya kirtans, maha abhishekam with water collected from holy rivers, among other activities, were held. Nitai Seveni Mataji and president of ISKCON Samba Das Prabhu preached Krishna Leela. The idols of Sri Radha, Damodar were decorated with silken robes sourced from Vrindavan and fresh flowers from different parts of the country. The premises witnessed a beehive of activity as thousands of devotees from the people of Visakhapatnam and surrounding areas visited. Traffic congestion was seen at Sagarnagar as many visited the temple. A special Harinama mandapam was set up so that the ardent devotees chant the Hare Krishna Maha Mantra 108 times before the darshan. Utlotsavam organised in the evening saw participation of thousands of children. Dance competitions and other contests engaged them. Adding to the spiritual fervour, the Hare Krishna Movement in Visakhapatnam celebrated Sri Krishna Janmashtami at Gadiraju Palace. Following an elaborate abhishekam that commenced at 6 am on Saturday, Sri Bala Gopala and Sri Radha Madan Mohan deities were decked up impressively on the occasion. Organised under the...

title: 특검, ‘평양 무인기 의혹’ 김용대 재소환
creator: 헤럴드경제
content: 14일 12시간 마라톤 조사 후 사흘만 합참 패싱·작전 은폐 추궁 [헤럴드경제=권제인 기자] 12·3 비상계엄 관련 내란·외환 의혹을 수사하는 조은석 특별검사팀이 17일 ‘평양 무인기 의혹’의 핵심 피의자인 김용대 드론작전사령관을 재차 소환했다. 특검팀은 이날 오전 10시부터 김 사령관을 피의자 신분으로 불러 조사 중이다. 지난 14일 12시간 가량의 ‘마라톤 조사’ 이후 사흘만이다. 김 사령관은 평양 무인기 작전 관련 외환·이적 의혹의 ‘키맨’으로 꼽히는 인물이다. 특검팀은 윤석열 전 대통령이 비상계엄 선포의 명분을 만들 목적으로 작년 10월께 드론사에 평양 무인기 투입을 지시했는지 조사 중이다. 작전의 계획·준비 단계가 정상적인 지휘 경로인 합참의장을 건너뛰고 이뤄지는 ‘합참 패싱’이 있었으며, 이 과정에 김용현 당시 경호처장이 관여했다는 의혹이 제기된 상태다. 작전 계획 단계인 작년 6월께 김용현 당시 처장이 군 핵심 관계자 다수에게 비화폰으로 연락해 무인기 작전을 물어본 사실도 드러났다. 특검팀은 군 지휘 계통에서 벗어난 김 당시 처장이 민간인 신분으로 무인기 작전에 관여하고 보고를 받았다면 그 자체만으로 법 위반 소지가 있다고 보고 조사를 이어가고 있다. 특검팀은 작전 이후 군이 이를 은폐하기 위해 조직적으로 움직인 사실이 있는지도 조사 중이다. 드론사가 지난해 10월 15일 군 무인기 1대만 비행하고도 2대를 비행한 것처럼 내부 문서를 허위로 꾸민 것으로 특검팀은 의심한다. 10월...

title: Trái tim lạc nhịp
creator: Trần Thái
content: Chị Bích Nhi (32 tuổi, ngụ TP HCM) thú nhận chị nhận ra mình mong ngóng những buổi sáng đi làm theo một cách khác lạ. Không phải vì đang thực hiện dự án mới hay vì nơi làm việc luôn có những đồng nghiệp vui tính, mà vì... một người mới đến. Cảm giác tội lỗi Anh vào làm hơn một tháng, ngồi bàn kế bên. Mỗi lần anh bước qua, mùi nước hoa nhè nhẹ như len vào trí nhớ, đến mức về đến nhà vẫn còn lảng vảng trong tâm trí chị. Anh không nói lời vượt giới hạn nhưng những câu quan tâm kiểu "Sao hôm nay chị uống ít nước thế?" hay "Trưa nay mình đi ăn món chị thích nhé?" lại khiến chị có cảm giác được để ý, nâng niu. Bên cạnh anh, chị được trò chuyện về sách, phim, thậm chí cả những giấc mơ vớ vẩn từng bỏ quên. Trong khi đó, chồng chị thường trở về nhà với gương mặt mệt mỏi, câu chuyện chung chỉ xoay quanh con cái và tiền bạc. Nhiều đêm nằm cạnh chồng, chị cố nhắm mắt mà những mẩu chuyện ban trưa với anh đồng nghiệp lại hiện lên mồn một đến khó chịu. Cảm giác ấy vừa ngọt ngào vừa nhói buốt khiến chị hổ thẹn, sợ một ngày nào đó mình sẽ không muốn rút chân khỏi mớ cảm xúc mơ hồ này. Anh Hân (36 tuổi, ngụ tỉnh Đồng Nai) cũng ở trong tình trạng tương tự. Dù đã có vợ và...

title: Becky Lynch Intercontinental Championship Defense Added To Monday Night Raw
creator: Rick Ucchino
content: Members of the Raw Women's Division continue to line up for a shot at The Man. Becky Lynch already has three successful defenses of her Women's Intercontinental Championship within the past month, and she'll have the opportunity to make it four this Monday night on Raw. Natalya took to social media Saturday night ahead of Triplemanía XXXIII to announce that Raw General Manager Adam Pearce has made it official, it will be Nattie facing Big Time Bex at the Xfinity Mobile Arena in Philadelphia. Natalya initially issued a challenge to Becky two weeks ago after she embarrassed and attacked WWE Hall of Famer Nikki Bella on Raw, but Lynch instead accepted that challenge on behalf of Maxxine Dupri. The Alpha Academy member has clearly been putting in work under the wing of Natalya and Maxxine nearly pulled off the shocking upset this past week in Quebec City. Will the teacher be able to succeed where the student did not? We'll find out this Monday night when Raw goes live on Netflix at 8 p.m. ET (5 p.m. PT). title: 木村拓哉、人生初の家系ラーメンに感動 行列店「厚木家」での撮影に大反響「これは神回」
creator: 佐藤俊治
jp
content: 木村拓哉さんが自身の YouTubeチャンネル で、人生初の家系ラーメンを食べる動画を公開し反響呼んでいます。 今回木村さんが訪れたのは、行列のできる家系ラーメン店として知られる神奈川県厚木市の「 厚木家 」。 出迎えた店主の吉村政紀さんは「普段YouTubeとかは全部断っているんですよ。でも、木村拓哉さんが好きなんで」と特別に許可したことを明かします。 その後、吉村さんと「家系ラーメン」の成り立ちについてトーク。吉村さんの父で家系ラーメンの始祖といわれる吉村実さんが開いた「吉村家」や「家系ラーメンの定義」について話を聞きました。 金が練り込まれているという特別な器に盛られたラーメンを食べた木村さんは「うまっ。なんだこれ」と驚きます。吉村さんは「これが会長(吉村実さん)が作った豚骨と醤油をブレンドしたスープですね」と説明しました。 動画では、その後も吉村さんと家系ラーメンについてトークをしながら、食べ進める姿を見ることができます。 最後は、大ファンだという吉村さんに木村さんがサイン入りの映画『グランメゾン・パリ』のDVDをプレゼント。店員にも握手をして、終了となりました。動画の反響は大きく、公開から半日で再生数が50万を超える大反響となっています。 公開された動画にファンからは「これは神回」「家系ラーメン好きにはたまらない」「厚木家で撮影できるのはすごい」などのコメントが寄せられています。 【動画】 厚木家のラーメンを堪能する木村さん 【あわせて読みたい】 木村拓哉、羽田空港のフライトシミュレーターに大興奮 『GOOD LUCK!!』に影響を受けた人物と対面も

title: Jean Roger AHOYO honoré à la 5e édition de « Célébrons nos icônes »
creator: F. Aubin Ahéhéhinnou
content: Le Centre de Promotion de l’Entrepreneuriat et des Arts (CEPREA), a rendu un vibrant hommage à Jean-Roger AHOYO, ancien ministre et ancien député à l’occasion de la 5e édition de ‘’Célébrons nos icônes’’. C’était à travers une cérémonie riche en couleurs ce samedi 16 août 2025, à Bénin Royal Hôtel de Cotonou. Jean-Roger AHOYO honoré à la 5e édition de ‘’Célébrons nos icônes’’ de l’ONG CEPREA. Le 1er directeur de Cabinet du président de l’ère du Renouveau Démocratique, ancien ministre, ancien député , ancien conseiller régionale de l’UNESCO, a eu droit à un tableau artistique présenté par le Groupe « Han-yé », à travers des hommages et panégyriques. Justino VIEIRA, au nom du cabinet CEPREA, a souligné dans son mot de bienvenue, la nécessité de célébrer les héros de la nation. « Nous célébrons trop peu nos héros (....), nous ne les célébrons pas du tout. (...) », a-t-il déploré avant d’indiquer Jean-Roger AHOYO comme « un homme discret » dont les œuvres sont immenses. « Toute la grande discrétion du personnage fait qu’il n’était pas au départ dans notre liste, mais l’immensité de ses œuvres parlent en son nom », a-t-il laissé entendre évoquant sa nomination le 08 septembre 1993, en tant que ministre de l’environnement sous l’ère du renouveau démocratique. Que retenir du personnage ? Jean-Roger AHOYO après son Baccalauréat en 1960, et d’un doctorat en 1976, a enseigné à l’Université nationale du Bénin (UNB),...

title: Kyle Busch airs out frustrations after massive wreck collects 12 cars at Richmond
creator: Brian Jones, 5 GOATs
content: Kyle Busch was involved in a big wreck at the NASCAR Cup Series race at Richmond Raceway on Saturday night and was not happy about it. After the wreck, Busch shared a strong reaction to his team. “It’s f***ing killed. The nose is killed,” Kyle Busch told his team about the No. 9 Chevrolet. 12 cars were involved in the wreck that happened nearly halfway through the race. Chase Elliott took the most damage and received his first DNF of the season. We’ll have more on this story shortly.

title: Vélez le ganó a Independiente en un partido de “pena máxima”
creator: Redacción LAVOZ
content: Vélez le ganó un partido muy caliente a Independiente 2 a 1 en Liniers y alcanzó la línea del puntero River en la Zona B del torneo Clausura de la Liga Profesional.El partido en el estadio del ganador, tuvo muchas incidencias, un expulsado, tres penales y mucho de nervios en los banco de suplentes.Un momento clave en el partido se dio sobre los 30 minutos de la primera etapa, cuando Lomónaco quiso pisar el balón en el borde dl área, la perdió y terminó cometiendo penal y recibiendo la roja.De esa jugada, Dilan Godoy lo cambió por gol para el 1 a 0 del equipo de Guillermo Barros Schelotto.Pero el equipo del “Melli” no logró imponer la superioridad numérica y por eso el conjunto de Vaccari nunca se dio por vencido hasta el final del juego.El local ganaba 1 a 0 y cuando imaginó que el partido marchaba hacia el desenlace final, Aaron Quirós cometió un error en su área y al resbalarse golpeó al chileno Galdames para cometerle penal que Felipe Loyola cambió por empate 1 a 1 a los 30 del ST.El empate fue un golpe para el local que se fue en busca de desnivelar y a falta de un puñado de minutos, el juvenil Jonathan De Irastorza tomó de la camiseta a Romero para que se sancionara otro penal en favor del local que el goleador usó para el 2 a 1.El visitante sigue sin ganar en el torneo y quedó último en su zona con dos puntos.Los goles¡¡DONDE LA PUSO EL PIBE!! ¡¡GOL DE DILAN GODOY Y VÉLEZ LE GANA 1-0 A INDEPENDIENTE!!📺 ESPN Premium | Suscribite al Pack Fútbol...

title: "내 허락받고 남친 사귀어라"...'성희롱·갑질' 서울대 교수, 대법 해임 확정
creator: asiae_daily
content: 학생들에게 성희롱과 갑질을 했다는 이유로 해임된 서울대학교 전임 교수가 불복해 제기한 해임 취소 소송이 대법원에서 최종 기각됐다. 17일 법조계에 따르면 대법원 3부(주심 노경필 대법관)는 A 교수가 교원소청심사위원회를 상대로 낸 해임처분취소청구 기각결정 취소 소송에서 하급심의 판단을 그대로 받아들여 원고 패소 판결을 확정했다. 쟁점 중 하나였던 증거의 위법성을 두고 재판부는, 피해자 측이 서울대 포털 계정에 무단 접근해 이메일 일부를 캡처한 행위가 있었더라도, 이는 형사소송이 아닌 행정소송에서는 자동으로 증거능력이 부정된다고 보기 어렵다고 판단했다. 대법원은 "절차상 하자나 징계의 위법성을 인정할 근거로는 부족하다"고 덧붙였다. 또한, 일부 징계 사유가 소명되지 않았다는 점은 인정되지만, 나머지 혐의들만으로도 해임 조치는 정당하다고 판단한 원심 판단에 법리적 오해가 없다고 판단했다. A 교수는 서울대 재직 당시 대학원생들에게 "지도교수 옆에 그림자처럼 붙어서 서빙할 정도로 예의를 갖추라"는 내용의 이메일을 보내는가 하면, "남자친구를 사귀려면 내 허락을 받아야 한다"는 등의 사생활 침해성 발언도 서슴지 않았던 것으로 조사됐다. 또 학생들에게 연구실 청소, 개인적 업무 등 강의나 연구와 무관한 일을 반복적으로 시킨 사실도 확인됐다. 서울대 인권센터는 지난 2018년 A 교수의 언행에 대해 인권침해 및 성희롱·성폭력 여부를 조사했고, 그해 말 중징계를 서울대 총장에게...

title: Aseguran 40 kg de cristal en Morelos
creator: Paola A
content: Cuernavaca, 16 de agosto 2025 (Infórmate y +).- Integrantes de la Mesa de Construcción de Paz y Seguridad Morelos aseguraron a dos hombres en posesión de aproximadamente 40 kilogramos de una sustancia con características similares al cristal, durante un operativo interinstitucional realizado en la zona metropolitana de la capital. La detención ocurrió la madrugada del sábado 16 de agosto, cuando elementos de la Secretaría de Seguridad Pública y Protección Ciudadana (SSPC) Morelos, en coordinación con la Secretaría de Marina (Semar), el Ejército Mexicano y la Guardia Nacional, interceptaron una camioneta Ford Escape con placas de Baja California en la salida hacia Emiliano Zapata, sobre la autopista México–Acapulco. Tras una revisión, localizaron un compartimiento oculto con 40 paquetes de alrededor de un kilo cada uno, con una sustancia ilícita de alta pureza. Los detenidos fueron identificados como Francisco “N”, de 60 años, originario de Zirándaro, Guerrero, y Alfredo “N”, de 55 años, residente de Morelia, Michoacán. La camioneta, los dos hombres y la droga quedaron a disposición de la Fiscalía General de la República (FGR) en Cuernavaca. El valor estimado del aseguramiento asciende a 8 millones de pesos, lo que representa un golpe económico para grupos delictivos que operan en la región centro y sur del estado. Las autoridades reiteraron que este tipo de operativos refuerzan la estrategia de seguridad instruida por la gobernadora Margarita...

title: واکنش دولت پزشکیان به سخنان تازه حسن روحانی درباره صداوسیما چه خواهد بود؟
creator: اطلاعات آنلاین
content: سعید رجبی فروتن در روزنامه اعتماد نوشت: حسن روحانی در دو دوره ریاست‌جمهوری خود از فعالیت پلتفرم‌ها و پخش فیلم و سریال بر بستر اینترنت به موازات تلویزیون دفاع کرد و در دولت اول او وزارت ارشاد به رسانه‌هایی که بعدا به صوت و تصویر فراگیر معروف شدند، پروانه فعالیت داد. روحانی از این‌که صداوسیما نظارت بر رسانه‌های جدید تولید و پخش تصویر را حق خود می‌دانست، مخالف بود. به‌طوری که وقتی رئیس وقت قوه قضاییه به درخواست صداوسیما طی بخشنامه‌ای از محاکم قضایی خواست که انحصارا صداوسیما را تنها مرجع صدور مجوز پلتفرم‌ها بدانند، روحانی در واکنش به این بخشنامه نوشت: حجت‌الاسلام‌والمسلمین جناب آقای رئیسی، رئیس محترم قوه قضاییه سلام‌علیکم احتراما این‌گونه امور مرتبط به شورای عالی فضای مجازی است. روحانی در جای دیگری با انتقاد از تفسیر موسع صداوسیما از صوت و تصویر فراگیر به کنایه نوشته بود با این حساب اشتراک فیلم و ویدیو در تلفن‌های همراه نیز باید تحت نظارت رسانه ملی قرار گیرد. (قریب به مضمون) روحانی در یک سخنرانی عمومی در سیرجان (۱۳۹۸) پایان دوره اقتدار و انحصار صداوسیما را اینگونه توصیف کرد: «گذشت آن زمانی که به اعتبار اصل ۴۴ قانون اساسی صداوسیما باید دولتی باشد. تمام شد دیگه. همه الان صداوسیما همراهشونه. همه موبایل‌ها صداوسیما هستند. فضای مجازی الان داره یک تحول عظیم در جامعه ایجاد می‌کنه. ما اگر بخواهیم بمانیم روی همان افکار گذشته‌مون ضرر می‌کنیم و به نفع مردم ما نیست. نباید کند حرکت کنیم نباید عقب بمانیم از دنیای امروز.» هر چه به پایان دوره دوم ریاست‌جمهوری روحانی نزدیک می‌شدیم وزیر فرهنگ او و معاونان وی، تحرک کمتری برای دفاع از ایده رئیس‌جمهور نشان می‌دادند و عملا راه انفعال را پیش...

title: 서울 마포구 아파트 화재...주민 대피·일부 연기 흡입
creator: 김형민
content: c뉴시스 서울 마포구 창전동 한 아파트에서 화재가 발생해 소방당국이 대응 1단계를 발령해 진화에 나섰다. 17일 소방당국에 따르면 이날 오전 8시11분쯤 마포구 창전동 한 아파트에서 불이 났다는 신고가 접수됐다. 소방당국은 오전 8시16쯤 대응 1단계를 발령한 뒤 진화 및 구조 작업을 벌이고 있다. 주민 대부분이 대피했고 연기를 마신 일부 주민이 구조된 것으로 전해진다. 불은 아파트 14층에서 발생한 것으로 알려졌고 정확한 인명 피해 여부는 확인되지 않고 있다.

title: Hallan dos cuerpos en rancho de comunidad Jesús María; Fiscalía investiga
creator: Claudia Ulloa
content: JESÚS MARÍA, Aguascalientes.- Los cadáveres de dos personas fueron descubiertos este sábado en el Rancho La Ventana, ubicado en la comunidad El Chichimeco, municipio conurbado al norte de la capital estatal.Autoridades recibieron un reporte ciudadano cerca de las 14:00 horas, lo que motivó el despliegue de policías estatales y municipales. Al ingresar al predio, localizaron el cuerpo semienterrado de un hombre, pero durante la inspección pericial se percataron de que había una segunda víctima en el mismo sitio.Banco de imágenesHasta el momento, no se han proporcionado detalles sobre las causas de muerte o posibles responsablesPersonal de la Fiscalía General del Estado, incluidos el Grupo de Homicidios y la Dirección de Servicios Periciales, acordonó la zona para recabar evidencias. Los cuerpos, aún sin identificar, fueron trasladados al Servicio Médico Forense para practicarles la necropsia de ley.Te podría interesar: Localizan en SLRC cuerpos de tres personas reportadas como privadas de la libertadSe inició una carpeta de investigación para esclarecer los hechos, mientras las autoridades analizan posibles líneas de indagatoria. Hasta el momento, no se han proporcionado detalles sobre las causas de muerte o posibles responsables.

title: ఈ మొక్కతో మోకాలి నొప్పి, షుగర్, బీపీ తగ్గుతుంది.. శరీరం ఉక్కులా మారుతుంది..! అదేంటో తెలుసుకోండి
creator: Jyothi Gadda
content: మన ప్రాచీన ఆయుర్వేదం ఆరోగ్యానికి ఔషధంగా నిరూపించబడుతున్న అనేక చెట్లు, మొక్కల గురించి ప్రస్తావిస్తుంది. కానీ, సరైన సమాచారం లేకపోవడం వల్ల మనం వాటిని సద్వినియోగం చేసుకోలేకపోతున్నాము. ఈ సదాపుష్పి కూడా వాటిలో ఒకటి. దీనిని సతత హరిత, శాశ్వత అని కూడా పిలుస్తారు. సతత హరిత మొక్కలో పువ్వులు 12 నెలల పాటు అంటే ఏడాది పొడవునా వికసిస్తాయి. కాబట్టి దీనిని సతత హరిత పువ్వు(సదాబహార్) అని పిలుస్తారు. దాని రంగురంగుల పువ్వుల సువాసన, ప్రత్యేకత భిన్నంగా ఉంటాయి. ఈ పూలను పూజ, అలంకరణతో పాటు, ఆరోగ్యానికి చాలా ప్రయోజనకరంగా పరిగణిస్తారు. పువ్వులు మాత్రమే కాదు, దాని ఆకులు, వేర్లు, కాండాలు కూడా ఆరోగ్యానికి మేలు చేస్తాయని ఆయుర్వేద ఆరోగ్య నిపుణులు చెబుతున్నారు. సదాపుష్పి మన శరీరానికి చాలా ఉపయోగకరమైన ఔషధం. మానవ శరీరంలోని అనేక బలహీనతలను దీని ద్వారా నయం చేయవచ్చు అంటున్నారు నిపుణులు. మరీ ఈ సదాపుష్పి ప్రయోజనాలు ఏమిటి ? సదాబహార్ ఏ వ్యాధులలో ప్రయోజనకరంగా ఉంటుంది ? దీని గురించి తెలుసుకుందాం- సతత హరిత మొక్కలో ఉండే మూలకాలు:ఈ సతత హరిత మొక్క ఆరోగ్యానికి చాలా మేలు చేస్తుంది. దీని పువ్వులు, ఆకులు, వేర్లు, కాండంలో సమృద్ధిగా ఆల్కలాయిడ్లు , అజ్మాలిసిన్, సర్పెంటైన్ ఉంటాయి. ఇవి అనేక తీవ్రమైన వ్యాధుల నుండి మనలను రక్షిస్తాయి. సతత హరిత మొక్క ఆరోగ్య ప్రయోజనాలు: సదాబహార్ ఆకులు లేదా పువ్వుల రసం తాగడం వల్ల శరీరంలో బలహీనత తొలగిపోతుంది. దీనితో పాటు, శరీర పెరుగుదల కూడా సరిగ్గా జరుగుతుంది. దీని కోసం మీరు ఈ రసాన్ని చక్కెర లేదా తేనెతో కలిపి తీసుకోవచ్చు. మీరు రోజుకు రెండుసార్లు తీసుకోవచ్చు. ఈ రసం తాగిన తర్వాత మీరు లేచినప్పుడు లేదా కూర్చున్నప్పుడు మీకు తల తిరగడం వంటి సమస్యలు దరి చేరకుండా ఉంటాయి. మోకాలి నొప్పిని వదిలించుకోండి : ఈ సతత హరిత...

title: ದೂರುದಾರ ಕೊಟ್ಟ ಸಾಕ್ಷ್ಯಗಳ ಬಗ್ಗೆಯೇ ಎಸ್‌ಐಟಿ ಉತ್ಖನನ
creator: Kannadaprabha News
content: ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು : ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳದಲ್ಲಿ ಅನಧಿಕೃತವಾಗಿ ಅಪರಿಚಿತ ಮೃತದೇಹಗಳ ಹೂತ ಪ್ರಕರಣ ಸಂಬಂಧ ದೂರುದಾರ ನೀಡಿದ ‘ತಲೆಬುರುಡೆ’ ಕುರಿತ ಅನುಮಾನ ನಿವಾರಿಸಲು ಮಣ್ಣಿನ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗೆ ವಿಶೇಷ ತನಿಖಾ ತಂಡ (ಎಸ್‌ಐಟಿ) ಮುಂದಾಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ತಿಳಿದು ಬಂದಿದೆ. ತಾನು ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳ ಸುತ್ತಮುತ್ತ ನೂರಾರು ಮೃತದೇಹಗಳನ್ನು ಹೂತು ಹಾಕಿದ್ದೇನೆ ಎಂದು ಆರೋಪಕ್ಕೆ ಪೂರಕವಾಗಿ ತಲೆಬರುಡೆಯನ್ನು ದೂರುದಾರ ಸಲ್ಲಿಸಿದ್ದ. ಇದೀಗ ಆತ ತಂದುಕೊಟ್ಟಿರುವ ತಲೆಬರುಡೆ ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳದಲ್ಲೇ ಹೂತು ಹಾಕಿದ್ದೇ ಅಥವಾ ಬೇರೆಡೆಯಿಂದ ತಂದಿರುವುದೇ ಎಂಬ ಶಂಕಾಸ್ಪದ ಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗಳು ಹುಟ್ಟಿಕೊಂಡಿವೆ. ಈ ಹಿನ್ನೆಲೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ತಲೆಬುರುಡೆಗೆ ಅಂಟಿರುವ ಮಣ್ಣು ಹಾಗೂ ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳದ ಮಣ್ಣಿನ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆ ಮೂಲಕ ಶಂಕೆ ನಿವಾರಿಸಲು ಎಸ್‌ಐಟಿ ಮುಂದಾಗಿದೆ. ಈ ಮಣ್ಣಿನ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಸಾಮ್ಯತೆ ಕಂಡು ಬಂದರೆ ದೂರುದಾರನ ಆರೋಪಕ್ಕೆ ಪುರಾವೆ ಸಿಗಲಿದೆ. ಇಲ್ಲದೇ ಹೋದರೆ ಆರೋಪದ ಹಿಂದೆ ಸಂಚು ನಡೆದಿದೆ ಎಂಬ ಆಪಾದನೆಗೆ ಮತ್ತಷ್ಟು ಬಲ ಬಂದಂತಾಗಲಿದೆ ಎಂದು ಮೂಲಗಳು ಮಾಹಿತಿ ನೀಡಿವೆ. ವರ್ಷದ ಹಿಂದಿನ ಮೃತದೇಹ: ಇನ್ನು ದೂರುದಾರನ ಮಾಹಿತಿ ಮೇರೆಗೆ ಗುಂಡಿ ಅಗೆಯುವಾಗ ಪಾಯಿಂಟ್‌ 14ರ ಸಮೀಪ ಅಪರಿಚಿತ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಯ ಮೃತದೇಹ ಪತ್ತೆಯಾಗಿತ್ತು. ಈ ಮೃತದೇಹ ವರ್ಷದ ಹಿಂದೆ ಮೃತಪಟ್ಟ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಯದ್ದಾಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ಮರಣೋತ್ತರ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ತಜ್ಞರು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಹೀಗಾಗಿ ವರ್ಷದ ಹಿಂದೆ ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳದಲ್ಲಿ ಮೃತದೇಹ ಹೂತಿರುವ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ದೂರುದಾರನಿಗೆ ಹೇಗೆ ತಿಳಿಯಿತು? ಅಲ್ಲದೆ, ತಾನು 2014ರಲ್ಲೇ ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳ ತೊರೆದಿದ್ದಾಗಿ ನ್ಯಾಯಾಲಯದಲ್ಲೇ ಆತ ಹೇಳಿಕೆ ಕೊಟ್ಟಿದ್ದಾನೆ. ಹೀಗಾಗಿ 11 ವರ್ಷಗಳ ಹಿಂದೆ ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳ ಬಿಟ್ಟಿದ್ದವನಿಗೆ ವರ್ಷದ ಹಿಂದೆ ಮೃತಪಟ್ಟ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಯ ಮಣ್ಣು ಮಾಡಿದ್ದು ಹೇಗೆ ತಿಳಿಯಿತು ಎಂಬ ಪ್ರಶ್ನೆ ಎಸ್‌ಐಟಿ ತಂಡದ ಮುಂದೆ ಬಂದಿದೆ. ಇದರ ಆಧಾರದ ಮೇರೆಗೆ ದೂರುದಾರನ ಸಂಪರ್ಕ ಜಾಲ ಶೋಧಿಸಲು ಸಹ ಎಸ್‌ಐಟಿ ಚಿಂತಿಸಿದೆ ಎನ್ನಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಎಸ್‌ಐಟಿ ಚಕ್ರವ್ಯೂಹದಲ್ಲಿ ದೂರುದಾರ: ಈ ಎರಡು ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಸಂಗತಿಗಳಿಂದ ದೂರುದಾರನೇ ಎಸ್ಐಟಿ ತನಿಖಾ ಚಕ್ರವೂಹ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಸಿಲುಕುವಂತೆ ಮಾಡಿದೆ. ತಾನು...

title: Thousands storm Manhattan calling for 'global intifada,' a phrase with a pending violence designation
creator: Alexandra Koch
content: 'Special Report' panelists Guy Benson, Olivia Beavers and Meghan Hays discuss an antisemitic terror attack in Colorado. Thousands of anti-Israel demonstrators reportedly flooded midtown Manhattan Saturday afternoon, calling for a "global intifada," a slogan many view as an incitement to violence against Jewish communities. The Stand with Gaza protesters, carrying signs seeking to "end all aid to Israel," clanged cowbells while chanting "free, free Palestine" and "Palestine will live forever." Since the Oct. 7, 2023, terror attack by Hamas in southern Israel, the phrase "globalize the intifada" has been referred to as a call for antisemitic violence. People chant slogans during the Stand with Gaza protest at Bryant Park in New York Aug. 16, 2025. (Leonardo Munoz/AFP via Getty Images) DEM LAWMAKER ADMITS PEOPLE MIGHT ACTUALLY MEAN IT WHEN THEY SAY ‘GLOBALIZE THE INTIFADA’ New York City mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani , a self-proclaimed Democratic socialist, recently sparked controversy after failing to publicly condemn the mantra. After critics noted his silence on the issue, he said it is not "language" he uses. "It is language, I understand, there are concerns about, and what I will do is showcase my vision for the city through my words and my actions," Mamdani said. People gather during the Stand with Gaza protest at Bryant Park in New York Aug. 16, 2025. (Leonardo Munoz/AFP via Getty Images) TOP DEMOCRATS, MEDIA DEMAND ZOHRAN MAMDANI CONDEMN 'GLOBALIZE THE INTIFADA'...

title: La danza de los millones en la Liga BetPlay: este fue el equipo que más dinero ganó en el mercado de fichajes
creator: Diego Ariza
content: El fútbol colombiano avanza en el segundo semestre con varios equipos sin muchas figuras, a comparación de lo que se vio entre 2024 y el pasado campeonato, pero con muchos jugadores que prometen ser protagonistas al final de la temporada, en la que el Junior es el actual líder e invicto.Un equipo se destacó por generar la mayor cantidad de dinero durante el mercado de fichajes, entre junio y julio, en el que logró ventas importantes de jugadores al exterior y tener el dinero suficiente no solo para rearmar la plantilla, sino para financiar otros proyectos y cubrir gastos.Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp ChannelSe espera que para 2026 se tengan nuevas figuras en el fútbol colombiano, recordando que en los últimos meses partieron personas como Falcao García y Juan Fernando Quintero, además de la lesión de Carlos Bacca en Junior que lo sacó de las canchas por lo que queda de 2025.El dinero movido en el mercado de fichajesEl traspaso de Jordan Barrera al Botafogo por cuatro millones de dólares se convirtió en la operación individual más costosa del mercado de fichajes de la Liga BetPlay en 2025, según datos de la plataforma especializada TransferMark.Esta cifra, que superó cualquier otra venta individual en el fútbol profesional colombiano durante ese periodo, no fue suficiente para que el Junior de Barranquilla encabezara la lista de clubes con mayores ingresos totales, pues el liderazgo en ese rubro correspondió al América de Cali,...

title: «Неприемлемо»: в МИД Франции открыто выступили против разоружения боевиков ВСУ
creator: Арсений Сотоф
content: Бенжамен Хаддад, министр-делегат по делам Европы при французском дипведомстве, заявил, что руководство его страны выступает против наложения ограничений на военный потенциал Украины в рамках процесса мирного урегулирования кризиса. Подробнстями он поделился с корреспондентом газеты La Tribune Dimanche. «...Любые намерения “демилитаризировать” Украину являются неприемлемыми», — подчеркнул Бенжамен Хаддад. Как указал дипломат в ходе беседы с La Tribune , боеспособность формирований ВСУ поможет Франции и Великобритании предоставить киевскому режиму некие «гарантии безопасности». Стоит отметить, что данную тему сейчас обсуждают не только лидеры Европы. Как сообщил ранее информированный источник, Президент Соединенных Штатов Дональд Трамп сам готов дать «гарантии безопасности» Украине, поставив властям страны условие отказаться от идеи вступления в Североатлантический альянс. В свою очередь, нежелание принять демилитаризацию и мирный диалог продолжает усугублять положение киевских боевиков на линии фронта. Ранее военный эксперт, отставной офицер Армии США Станислав Крапивник в ходе эксклюзивного интервью «МК» объяснил, как тема кризиса ВСУ могла повлиять на переговоры Президентов Владимира Путина и Дональда Трампа на Аляске 15 августа. Ваша надежная лента новостей — «МК» в MAX

title: Kisah Japan Airlines Jatuh Tewaskan 520 Orang, Si 'Titanic Jepang' yang Dibiarkan 12 Jam
creator: Muhaimin
content: TOKYO - Pada 12 Agustus 1985 atau empat dekade silam, Japan Airlines Penerbangan 123 jatuh dan menewaskan 520 orang di dalamnya. Dijuluki sebagai "Titanic Jepang", kecelakaan tragis ini tetap dikenang sebagai salah satu tragedi penerbangan terburuk sepanjang masa. Foto-foto terakhir yang mengerikan menunjukkan pesawat tersebut beberapa saat sebelum jatuh karena kegagalan kritis. Pesawat Boeing 747SR-46 itu jatuh hanya 100 km di barat laut Tokyo. Di dalam pesawat tersebut terdapat 509 penumpang dan 15 awak. Hanya empat orang yang selamat. Si "Titanic Jepang" ini lepas landas dari Tokyo dan menuju Osaka, tetapi secara tragis jatuh di daerah terpencil di pegunungan Takamagahara. Baca Juga: Sudah 11 Tahun Pesawat MH370 Hilang Tanpa Jejak, Ini Kronologi hingga Pesan Kokpitnya Salah satu dari beberapa foto terakhir menunjukkan bahwa pesawat tersebut kehilangan sirip ekornya. Foto lain, yang diduga merupakan foto terakhir yang diambil di dalam pesawat, menunjukkan masker oksigen tergantung di langit-langit kabin. Pesawat diperkirakan dalam keadaan baik-baik saja, dan perjalanan dimulai normal setelah semua pemeriksaan rutin. Namun, hanya 12 menit setelah lepas landas, Kopilot Yutaka Sasaki dan Kapten Pilot Masami Takahama menyadari adanya getaran yang merobek pesawat. Pesawat jet tersebut mengalami dekompresi dengan cepat, yang menyebabkan langit-langit di dekat kamar mandi belakang runtuh. Getaran hebat itu merusak badan pesawat secara parah dan menghancurkan penstabil vertikal...

title: “야구볼땐 홈런볼” KBO스폰서 신한銀, 해태제과와 손잡고 한정판 홈런볼 출시
creator: 매일경제
content: KBO 공식스폰서인 신한은행이 해태제과와 손잡고 야구장 대표 과자인 해태제과의 ‘홈런볼’ 한정판 패키지 상품을 출시하고, 취약계층 어린이들에게 기부한다. 16일 신한은행에 따르면 지난 14일부터 ‘한정판 홈런볼’을 출시해 판매하고 있다. 이번 ‘한정판 홈런볼’은 신한은행 캐릭터 ‘SOL’과 홈런볼 캐릭터 ‘RO’를 활용한 패키지로 제작됐으며, 현재 전국 약 5만 3000여 개 마트에서 판매 중이다. 제품 구매 고객을 대상으로 신한금융그룹 공식 SNS 채널에서 이벤트를 진행하고 있으며, 오는 8월 26일부터는 ‘쏠야구 플러스’를 통한 추가 이벤트도 진행할 예정이다. 신한은행은 또 초록우산어린이재단과 협력해 서울, 경기 등 전국 10개 권역 지역아동센터의 취약계층 아동 5000여 명에게 ‘한정판 홈런볼’ 3만봉을 기부할 예정이다. 이번 기부는 유소년들에게 야구의 즐거움과 응원의 메시지를 전하고 지역사회에 나눔 문화 확산을 위해 마련 됐다. 신한은행 관계자는 “이번 홈런볼 프로젝트는 고객에게 야구를 통한 새로운 즐거움을 제공함과 동시에 스포츠를 매개로 한 사회공헌 활동의 일환”이라며 “앞으로도 야구 팬과 지역사회가 함께할 수 있는 다양한 프로젝트를 지속적으로 추진하겠다”고 말했다.

title: 桌球|尼爾羅拔臣險勝奧蘇利雲 奪沙特大師賽冠軍
creator: 香港01
content: 沙特桌球大師賽決賽上演「新香港人」對決,尼爾羅拔臣(Neil Robertson)與「火箭」奧蘇利雲(Ronnie O'Sullivan)鬥足19局,最終由羅拔臣以10:9險勝,捧走冠軍獎盃兼獎金50萬鎊。 羅拔臣在首節打得順風順水,早早領先至6:2,比賽重開後再憑一杆97度拉開至7:2。不過奧蘇利雲隨即展開反撲,轟出職業生涯第1300次破百的139度,再連續打97度與89度,瞬間追成5:7,之後奧蘇多贏兩局,扳平7:7。羅拔臣頂住壓力以75度贏回一局,但奧蘇利雲再連下兩城,反先9:8,離冠軍僅一步之遙。關鍵時刻,羅拔臣憑一杆101度將比賽帶入決勝局,終再以另一杆101度完成絕地反擊,最終以10:9封王。 現年43歲的羅拔臣形容這是生涯最重要勝仗之一:「無法用言語解釋這個冠軍的意義。去年我一度跌出世界前20,如今能打敗Ronnie,證明永不言棄的重要。我希望這故事能啟發年輕球手,重點不是跌得多深,而是反彈得多高。」 落敗的奧蘇利雲雖錯失個人第42個排名賽冠軍,但仍獲20萬英鎊亞軍獎金,加上「147滿分獎金」及分紅,合共袋走38萬鎊,同樣滿載而歸。

title: 리비아 2차 지방 도시 선거 실시... 63개 도시 중 26곳서
creator: 차미례 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 차미례 기자 = 리비아가 16일(현지시간) 지방선거 2차 시장 선거를 실시해 오전 9시부터 오후 6시까지 전국 투표소에서 투표가 진행되었다고 리비아 국가 최고선거위원회( HNEC)가 이 날 발표했다. 이번 선거는 애초에 발표했던 63개 도시 가운데 26 곳에 걸쳐서 실시되었다고 선관위는 밝혔다. 나머지 도시들은 최근 선관위원들에 대한 공격 사건 등 보안상의 문제와 여러가지 "불법적인 사건들" 때문에 중단된 것이라고 HNEC는 설명했다. 리비아 정부는 최근의 선거관련 폭력 사태는 리비아 국민들의 의사 결정을 방해하려는 " 어둠과 불안정을 추구하려는 세력들의 더 큰 음모 가운데 일부"인 난동이었다고 발표했다. 지방 도시 선거의 제 1차 선거는 지난 해 11월 전국 58개 도시에서 실시되었고, 투표율은 74%를 기록했다. 리비아는 2011년 나토의 지원으로 일어난 민중 봉기로 독재자 무암마르 카다피가 축출되었다. 그 뒤로는 트리폴리에 있는 유엔이 인정하는 정부와 동부 지역의 군벌 칼리파 하프타르 장군 휘하의 리비아 국민군의 정부로 양분되어 있는 상황이다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Anh nhớ về thăm mẹ...
creator: Nguyễn Minh Hải
content: Tôi nhớ một người bạn, gần như tuần nào cũng lái xe gần 350 km từ TP HCM về Ninh Thuận thăm song thân. Tôi cũng nhớ một người bạn khác thường nhắc: "Anh nhớ về thăm để thôi mẹ trông...". Và tôi lại nhớ mỗi lần gọi điện, mẹ thường hỏi: "Chừng nào con về?". Tôi ở cách xa mẹ chỉ hơn trăm cây số, đi chưa đầy 3 giờ. Ngày trước, khi còn rảnh, đôi ba tuần, tôi phóng xe máy về, lúc quay lại thì đầy trái cây, rau củ. Sau này, có ô tô nhưng công việc bận rộn khiến những chuyến về thưa dần. Hồi ba còn sống, tôi về nhiều hơn. Ba không chỉ là cha, là thầy mà còn là một người bạn lớn. Chúng tôi có thể trò chuyện thoải mái về nhiều chuyện, luôn tìm được sự đồng cảm. Ba mất, tôi sợ về nhà vì những ký ức gắn với ông khiến lòng quặn thắt. Phải rất lâu sau tôi mới đủ bình tâm để nhìn lại cảnh cũ. Trong bài hát "Anh nhớ về thăm mẹ", nhạc sĩ Nguyễn Hữu Thiết như nhắc nhở những người con đi xa: "Dẫu xa xôi, anh nhớ về thăm mẹ... Anh hãy nhớ nắm đôi tay gầy yếu xanh xao màu nhánh cỏ hoang sơ... Anh hãy nhớ nhìn sâu trong mắt mẹ, chứa chan đầy nỗi nhớ nỗi thương...". Bài hát ấy mỗi lần nghe là lòng tôi quặn thắt. "Nước mắt chảy xuôi", tôi yêu thương các con chắc cũng như...

title: Hàng trăm cảnh sát ập vào phá đường dây kinh doanh đa cấp đang lôi kéo 200 người dự "hội thảo"
creator: Theo Như Quỳnh
content: Ngày 16-8, Công an tỉnh Phú Thọ cho biết vừa triệt phá đường dây kinh doanh đa cấp trái phép núp bóng đầu tư tiền kỹ thuật số, thu hồi hơn 30 tỉ đồng (hơn 50% số tiền bị lừa đảo), bắt các đối tượng cầm đầu, chủ chốt. Cơ quan Công an tiến hành khám xét khi các đối tượng tổ chức hội thảo. Ảnh: Công an cung cấp Trước đó, Phòng An ninh mạng và phòng, chống tội phạm sử dụng công nghệ cao, Công an tỉnh Phú Thọ, phát hiện nhóm đối tượng tại Hà Nội và TP HCM đã tổ chức huy động vốn trái phép thông qua website https://tcis.ai và đồng tiền kỹ thuật số mang tên TCIS. Chúng sử dụng mô hình đa cấp, chiêu trò tinh vi để lấy tiền của người tham gia sau trả cho người tham gia trước nhằm mục đích chiếm đoạt tài sản. Nhận thấy tính chất đặc biệt nghiêm trọng và thủ đoạn tinh vi của nhóm đối tượng, Công an tỉnh Phú Thọ đã xác lập chuyên án đấu tranh. Ngày 9-8-2025, khi các đối tượng tổ chức hội thảo quy mô khoảng 200 người tại khu du lịch Ao Vua, xã Suối Hai, TP Hà Nội nhằm tuyên truyền, lôi kéo đầu tư đồng tiền kỹ thuật số TCIS. Hàng trăm cán bộ, chiến sĩ đồng loạt khám xét, bắt giữ các đối tượng cầm đầu và chủ chốt tại hiện trường, đồng thời tuyên truyền, cảnh báo người tham dự về...

title: Cổng thông tin hỗ trợ người nộp thuế tích hợp trợ lý AI sắp vận hành
creator: Theo Bảo Nguyên
content: Trong bối cảnh kinh tế số phát triển mạnh mẽ, hoạt động kinh doanh ngày càng đa dạng, Cục Thuế cho biết đang chuẩn bị ra mắt Cổng thông tin hỗ trợ cá nhân, hộ kinh doanh và doanh nghiệp. Đây được xem là bước đi quan trọng nhằm đồng hành cùng cộng đồng kinh doanh phát triển bền vững, đồng thời hạn chế những sai sót khi thực hiện nghĩa vụ thuế. Giao diện Cổng thông tin hỗ trợ cá nhân, hộ kinh doanh, doanh nghiệp được thiết kế tối giản và thân thiện với người nộp thuế Cổng thông tin mới được thiết kế như một công cụ hỗ trợ thiết thực, giúp người nộp thuế dễ dàng tra cứu thông tin, tiếp cận các quy định của Nhà nước một cách chính xác và kịp thời. Nội dung do chính cơ quan thuế biên soạn, vừa đảm bảo tính chuẩn xác, vừa được trình bày sinh động, dễ hiểu thông qua các bài viết, hình ảnh và video ngắn. Điểm nổi bật của Cổng là tính năng tích hợp chatbot trợ lý AI có khả năng tư vấn kinh doanh. Công nghệ này giúp cá nhân, hộ kinh doanh và doanh nghiệp nhanh chóng tiếp cận thông tin hữu ích, đồng thời nâng cao hiệu quả bán hàng và tuân thủ thuế. Nhờ đó, người dùng có thể hạn chế được những sai sót thường gặp trong quá trình kê khai, nộp thuế và quản lý hoạt động kinh...

title: Kolhapur circuit bench | सर्किट बेंच हे ‘पुढारी’च्या विधायक पत्रकारितेचे यश
creator: पुढारी वृत्तसेवा

title: 米山隆一氏「ネット世論バッシング」めぐり「凌駕する第5の権力」「民主主義の破壊」の恐れ指摘(日刊スポーツ)
В ОП предложили ограничить возможность давать детям неблагозвучные имена
creator: RT на русском
content: Председатель комиссии Общественной палаты (ОП) по демографии, защите семьи, детей и традиционных семейных ценностей Сергей Рыбальченко выразил мнение, что родители должны быть ограничены в выборе неблагозвучных и «неодушевлённых» имён для своих детей. По его словам, такая мера позволит защитить прежде всего права самого ребёнка, так как неблагозвучное имя может стать поводом для насмешек, нападок и травли сверстников в детстве и подростковом возрасте. «Существующие ограничения должны быть дополнены исходя из имеющегося опыта. Например, чтобы нельзя было называть детей неодушевлёнными предметами, как стол, трактор, айфон и прочее», — цитирует Рыбальченко ТАСС. Список рекомендованных имён он предложил разместить на «Госуслугах». В июне первый зампред комитета Госдумы по защите семьи, вопросам отцовства, материнства и детства Татьяна Буцкая («Единая Россия») рассказала в интервью ТАСС на полях ПМЭФ, что депутаты разрабатывают принципы формирования списка разрешённых в России имён.

title: "트럼프 '휴전 대신 평화협정', 푸틴에 무기한 전쟁 허용" NYT
creator: 김승민 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 김승민 기자 = 도널드 트럼프 미국 대통령이 블라디미르 푸틴 러시아 대통령과의 알래스카 정상회담에서 러시아의 무기한 전쟁 지속을 허용했다고 미국 언론이 평가했다. 뉴욕타임스(NYT)는 16일(현지 시간) "트럼프 대통령은 즉시 휴전을 추진하지 않겠다고 밝히는 대신 우크라이나의 영토 포기를 요구하는 더 광범위한 평화협정이라는 푸틴 대통령의 선호에 굴복했다"며 "푸틴 대통령은 추가 제재 없이 전쟁을 무기한으로 계속할 수 있는 권한을 부여받았다"고 보도했다. 앞서 트럼프 대통령은 지난 7월14일 러시아에 '50일 내 휴전 불응시 최대 100%의 세컨더리(제재 대상국과 관련된 제3국 대상 제재) 관세 부과'를 공언하며 압박했고, 28일에는 시한을 '10~12일'로 단축하며 즉각 휴전을 추진했다. 그러나 15일 성사된 푸틴 대통령과의 정상회담의 결론은 '휴전'이 아닌 '평화협정'이었다. 트럼프 대통령은 회담 후 트루스소셜에 "끔찍한 전쟁을 끝내는 가장 좋은 방법은 종종 유지되지 않는 단순한 휴전 협정이 아니라 전쟁을 종식하는 평화협정으로 직행하는 것이라는 게 모두의 결정이었다"고 밝혔다. 회담 직전 이뤄진 폭스뉴스 인터뷰에서는 "휴전이 이뤄지지 않는다면 기쁘지 않을 것"이라며 "모두가 휴전이 성사되지 않을 것이라고 하지만, 나는 그것에 만족하지 않을 것"이라고 자신감을 드러냈지만 태도를 바꾼 것이다. 이에 트럼프 대통령이 푸틴 대통령의 요구에 따라 또다시 입장을 바꿨다는 비판이 제기된다. NYT는...

title: Hundreds brave rain to rally for Zara Qairina and safer schools in Sabah
content: KOTA KINABALU, Aug 17 — Rallies across Sabah continued to be held in remembrance of the late Zara Qairina Mahathir.On Saturday evening, one such rally took place at Lintasan Deasoka here, with around 500 people in attendance despite continuous rain. Participants stood under umbrellas as they chanted support for Zara and her family, while others held placards demanding that schools be made safe spaces for all.Police guarded the perimeter to safeguard against any untoward incidents.According to organiser Jaya Kumar, 47, from the Indian Civil Servant Retirees Organisation, the gathering was to demand justice for Zara and highlight the rising number of bullying incidents.Jaya said if it wasn’t for the rakyat’s voices, the case might have already been closed, expressing dismay over a recent report that an investigating officer in the case failed to follow Standard Operating Procedures.“This issue does not involve race or religion, it involves the loss of a child’s life. I have children. How can I trust to send them to school with the situation now? Strict action must be taken by the authorities, parents and schools over this bullying issue. I hope that not just in Sabah, but the whole Malaysia, we do not see a second Zara,” he said. Organiser Jaya Kumar said the gathering is also to highlight the rising number of bullying incidents. — The Borneo Post pic Meanwhile, Dato Seri Rajandran, 66, said to be from the Kedah Royal Family Association, suggested that schools place a...

title: 양성원 첼리스트 "바흐는 낭만, 낭만은 바흐"
creator: 조민선
content: 한 음악가가 젊을 때 반짝이는 것은 쉽다. 하지만 세월이 흘러도 존경받고 빛나려면 무던한 노력이 필요하다. 단순한 기교를 넘어 한 인간으로서의 성숙이 점점 더 중요해지기 때문이다. 뛰어난 재능과 실력이 오래 지속되려면, 이를 지탱할 철학과 성실한 삶의 태도가 있어야 한다. 안드라스 쉬프, 마르타 아르헤리치 같은 거장들이 수십 년 동안 여전히 존경받는 이유도 거기에 있다. 한국을 대표하는 첼리스트 양성원(57)도 마찬가지다. 수영과 러닝으로 다져진 탄탄한 체력, 사람과 화합하는 성격, 음악의 사회적 역할에 대한 깊은 철학이 그의 음악 인생을 단단히 붙잡고 있다. 올해 첼로 인생 50년을 맞은 그와 최근 서울 마포구의 연세대 음대 교수실에서 만났다. “음악은 단순한 예술을 넘어 사회적 소통과 화합의 도구여야 합니다.” 8월 초 폐막한 평창대관령음악제 예술감독으로서 일을 마친 그는 국내외, 세대 간의 균형과 교류를 강조했다. 흥행보다 중요한 건 음악적 가치와 희망, 위로의 메시지다. 올여름 그는 이탈리아, 일본, 프랑스, 캐나다를 오갔다. 평창대관령음악제를 마치고는 독일로 떠난다. 동시에 연세대학교 음악대학에서 학생들을 가르친다. 그 어떤 음악가보다 촘촘한 일정을 소화하는 그는 사회적 의미가 있는 공연에 마음을 준다. 마포 'M클래식 축제'와의 인연도 이런 철학에 기반한다. M클래식은 올해 10회를 맞은 마포문화재단의 클래식 축제로 오는 22일부터 12월 6일까지 22회 공연이 열린다. 양성원은...

title: Trump tells Zelenskyy that Putin wants more of Ukraine
creator: The Korea Herald
content: WASHINGTON/MOSCOW/KYIV (Reuters) -- US President Donald Trump said on Saturday that Ukraine should make a deal to end the war with Russia because "Russia is a very big power, and they’re not,” after a summit where Vladimir Putin was reported to have demanded more Ukrainian land. After the two leaders met in Alaska on Friday, Trump told Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy that Putin had offered to freeze most front lines if Kyiv ceded all of Donetsk, the industrial region that is one of Moscow’s main targets, a source familiar with the matter said. Zelenskyy rejected the demand, the source said. Russia already controls a fifth of Ukraine, including about three-quarters of Donetsk province, which it first entered in 2014. Trump also said he agreed with Putin that a peace deal should be sought without the prior ceasefire that Ukraine and its European allies had demanded. That was a change from his position before the summit, when he said he would not be happy unless a ceasefire was agreed on. "It was determined by all that the best way to end the horrific war between Russia and Ukraine is to go directly to a Peace Agreement, which would end the war, and not a mere Ceasefire Agreement, which often times do not hold up," Trump posted on Truth Social. Zelenskyy said Russia’s unwillingness to pause the fighting would complicate efforts to forge a lasting peace. "Stopping the killing is a key element of stopping the war," he said on X. Nevertheless, Zelenskyy said he would meet...

title: Church hat-trick leads Spirit to victory
creator: Kayla Hodge
content: Wellington Pride were hot on attack when first five Arelene Landon-Lane went to chip it over. But the Otago Spirit lock was one step ahead, timing her jump perfectly to snaffle the ball and took off. She stormed nearly 50m down the park and popped it inside to centre Naomi Sopoaga, who finished off for the Spirit. It was one of six exciting tries the Spirit scored in their 32-26 Farah Palmer Cup Championship win against the Pride in Porirua this afternoon. Captain Greer Muir and Sarah Jones were instrumental in the loose forwards, and Jamie Church showed her electric pace out wide with a hat-trick. The Spirit put in a massive shift defensively to keep the Pride at bay. Abigail Paton – playing at first five with Georgia Cormick out injured - came up with some individual brilliance to start them off. She showed her class stepped three defenders and it took three more to bring her down. But she released the ball got to her feet and banged down to score the opener just shy of the 20 minute mark. Muir was not far behind with her own. After keeping the Pride out yet again, the Spirit shifted up the park when Muir started her 50m effort. The flanker stormed ahead after breaking the line, threw a dummy between two Wellington defenders who barely touched Muir as she slipped through to score under the posts. It gave the Spirit a 12-0 lead. The Spirit’s defence stood stall yet again when No 8 Jackie Patea-Fereti was held up. They refused to go away when centre Litia Bulicakau put a...

title: MLB Gameday live updates: Brewers at Reds game on 08/16/2025 free - MLB.com
부산형 자원순환정책, 파라과이 '수출'한다... 정책결정자 초청 국제연수
creator: asiae_daily
content: 부산형 국제개발 협력 연수 모델이 본격적으로 가동된다. 부산의 자원순환 정책이 파라과이의 미래 도시 전략으로 전파되고 있다. 부산시가 파라과이의 정책결정자들을 초청해 자원순환 정책 연수를 시작했다. 시는 17일부터 오는 30일까지 2주간 '파라과이 수도권 고형 폐기물 관리 역량 강화' 연수를 운영한다고 알렸다. 이번 사업은 부산시와 부산글로벌도시재단이 공동 주관하며 한국국제협력단(KOICA) 공모에 선정돼 2025년부터 2027년까지 3년간 국비 약 8억원을 지원받는다. 연수에 누에바 콜롬비아 시장, 빌라엘리사 시의원, 감사원 사무국장 등 파라과이 정책결정자 14명이 참가한다. 참가자들은 정책 강의, 현장 방문, 체험 활동, 워크숍 등 이론과 실습이 균형 잡힌 맞춤형 프로그램을 이수한다. 부산시 자원순환과장이 직접 나서는 '순환 경제 정책 간담회'를 통해 현지 현안에 적용 가능한 정책 아이디어를 나눈다. 부산의 자원순환 현장을 체험하는 일정도 눈길을 끈다. 주요 방문지는 부산환경공단 자원순환 협력센터, ESG 기반 사회가치경영센터, 시민 나눔장터, 도모헌 등이다. 참가자들은 '폐기물에 대한 시민 인식 개선과 참여 확대'라는 과제를 중심으로 부산시의 사례를 살펴본다. 연수 마지막 주에는 참가자들이 직접 실행계획(Action Plan)을 도출해 오는 27일 '순환 경제 공적 개발 원조(ODA) 토론회'에서 발표한다. 토론회는 해운대 창업공간 100에서 열리며 지역 민·관·산·학 관계자 50여명이 참석해...

title: Kyle Busch spins Chase Briscoe, collects handful of NASCAR Cup contenders in ‘big one’ at Richmond
creator: Herd Nation
content: Chaos at Richmond Raceway! Kyle Busch got into Chase Briscoe, and now we have multiple cars on the track, totally wrecked. Busch even collected Chase Elliott in the aftermath, which will cause his streak of top-20 finishes to come to an end. A lot of NASCAR teams are fuming. Chase Briscoe, Chase Elliott, Justin Haley, Denny Hamlin, Kyle Busch, Brad Keselowski, Cole Custer, Ross Chastain, Ty Dillon, William Byron, and Erik Jones were all involved. Just a massive wreck that will change how this race plays out. Coming off of the restart for the Cody Ware caution, this field was bumping and banging for position. Kyle Larson has some role to play in this, as he blocked Briscoe, which then caused Busch to get into the 19. This is a big one. Let’s see how the rest of this race plays out. A huge stack up involves a bunch of contenders! pic.twitter.com/lpdyz5K7hV— NASCAR (@NASCAR) August 17, 2025This is a developing story...

title: Daily horoscope: ಸೂರ್ಯನು ಕರ್ಕಾಟಕ ರಾಶಿಯಿಂದ ಸಿಂಹ ರಾಶಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಸಂಚಾರ
creator: TV9 Web Team
content: ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು, ಆಗಸ್ಟ್​ 17: ಭಾನುವಾರದ ರಾಶಿ ಫಲಗಳನ್ನು ಖ್ಯಾತ ಜ್ಯೋತಿಷಿ ಡಾ. ಬಸವರಾಜ ಗುರೂಜಿ ಅವರು ತಿಳಿಸಿಕೊಟ್ಟಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಈ ದಿನ ಸೂರ್ಯನು ಸಿಂಹ ರಾಶಿಗೆ ಪ್ರವೇಶಿಸುತ್ತಾನೆ. ಮೇಷ ರಾಶಿಯವರಿಗೆ ಐದು ಗ್ರಹಗಳ ಶುಭ ಫಲವಿದೆ. ಆರ್ಥಿಕ ಪ್ರಗತಿ, ವೃತ್ತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಏಳಿಗೆ ಹಾಗೂ ನೂತನ ಭೂಮಿ ಅಥವಾ ಕಟ್ಟಡ ಖರೀದಿ ಯೋಗವಿದೆ. ಆದರೆ ಆಸ್ತಿಗೆ ಸಂಬಂಧಿಸಿದ ಚಿಂತೆ ಕಾಡಬಹುದು. ವೃಷಭ ರಾಶಿಯವರಿಗೆ ಆರು ಗ್ರಹಗಳ ಶುಭ ಫಲವಿದೆ. ಕೆಲಸಕಾರ್ಯಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಯಶಸ್ಸು ಸಾಧ್ಯ. ಕಬ್ಬಿಣದ ವಸ್ತುಗಳ ಬಳಕೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಎಚ್ಚರಿಕೆ ವಹಿಸುವಂತೆ ಸಲಹೆ ನೀಡಲಾಗಿದೆ.

title: El motor científico de la UV rompe la ficción de “control” y “calma”
creator: De la Redacción
content: Por Alejandro LeónEn días recientes se hizo público un pronunciamiento de 80 integrantes del Sistema Nacional de Investigadoras e Investigadores (SNII) de la Universidad Veracruzana en contra de la prórroga ilegal e ilegítima del rector saliente, Martín Gerardo Aguilar Sánchez.Se trata de un bloque con alta representatividad, transversalidad de disciplinas y prestigio académico que, por su peso, desmiente la pretendida “calma” y el supuesto “control” institucional que la Rectoría saliente ha intentado proyectar en este inicio de ciclo escolar —por ejemplo, en el fastuoso acto de bienvenida con claros toques propagandísticos y de campaña, realizado el pasado viernes en el Nido del Halcón con recursos públicos de la UV—.Las y los firmantes abarcan todos los niveles del SNII, desde Candidaturas hasta Eméritos. Tres cuartas partes corresponden a Nivel I y Nivel II, es decir, investigadoras e investigadores activos y productivos. Casi el 38 % son integrantes consolidados en los Niveles II, III y Emérito, lo que aporta legitimidad y solidez.La pluralidad disciplinaria es amplia: ciencias biomédicas, sociales, humanidades, artes y áreas aplicadas. En otras palabras, no es un gesto aislado, sino un frente académico transversal y crítico.Conviene subrayar que entre las cuatro funciones sustantivas de la Universidad Veracruzana se encuentra la investigación. Y el motor del cumplimiento de esa función recae precisamente en las y los académicos que cumplen con los...

title: Advierten boicot para retrasar megaobra de agua y alcantarillado La Nueva Rinconada
creator: Rosario Aronés
content: SEDAPAL retira a funcionario de supervisora acusado de boicot, pero permite reingreso de ingeniero que fue separado a pedido de la población.Ante la presión de la población que convocó a una marcha de protesta por la demora en la ejecución de la obra La Nueva Rinconada, que beneficiará a más de 500 mil familias de los distritos de San Juan de Miraflores, Villa María del Triunfo y Villa El Salvador, la empresa estatal SEDAPAL, mediante la carta N° 3364-2025-EO informó el retiro del ingeniero Raúl Gálvez coordinador de la supervisión de la obra, pero sigue permitiendo el ingreso del también ingeniero Alfredo Acruta, ambos sindicados por la población como responsables del boicot sistemático a la ejecución de la obra y ha permitido el reingreso del ingeniero Ángel García, quien fue retirado de la obra a pedido expreso de la población mediante la carta N°359-CCSE-300 NR, SJM. VMT. VES del 28 de agosto de 2024.En el documento que los dirigentes entregaron al gerente general de Sedapal, señalan que el supervisor de obra en el área técnica (Ángel García) “mostraba poco interés y falta de información en las reuniones en la que participamos” y advirtieron que eran víctimas del menosprecio y discriminación de parte del citado funcionario que fue retirado de la obra pero ahora lo han vuelto a convocar, poniendo en grave riesgo los trabajos, debido a que los pobladores rechazan la presencia del referido ingeniero.Precisamente, el 11 de agosto de este año, los...

title: 소다남매, 달달한 연애담→母 이윤진 울린 진심 고백
creator: 이수진
content: 사진제공ᅵENA ‘소다남매’ 소을·다을이가 훌쩍 자란 근황을 전한다. 17일 방송되는 ENA 일요예능 ‘내 아이의 사생활’ 34회에서는 발리에서 한국을 찾은 소을과 남자친구 리오, 그리고 다을과 여자친구가 함께한 더블 데이트 현장이 공개된다. 소을은 영국 출신의 한 살 연하 남자친구 리오와 함께 귀국해 다을을 만난다. 세 사람은 감자탕부터 볶음밥까지 K-푸드로 식사를 즐기며 연애담을 나누고, 이 자리에서 다을이 여자친구가 있다는 사실도 밝혀져 모두를 놀라게 한다. 스튜디오에서 이를 지켜보던 엄마 이윤진은 “나만 없네”라고 혼잣말을 해 웃음을 자아냈다. 이후 다을의 여자친구까지 합류해 본격적인 더블 데이트가 이어진다. 민속촌을 방문한 네 사람은 풋풋한 하루를 보내며 서로 다른 커플 케미를 뽐낸다. 2년 차에 접어든 소을과 리오는 다정한 분위기를 자아냈고, 이제 막 시작한 다을 커플은 어색하면서도 풋풋한 매력을 보였다. 사진제공ᅵENA 이윤진은 “10대 때 건강한 교제를 반대하지 않는다”며 “오히려 오픈해서 부모님들이 다 아는 게 아이들에게도 안정적인 것 같다”고 아이들의 이성 교제에 관한 철학을 밝힌다. 데이트를 마친 뒤 숙소로 돌아온 소다남매는 야식 시간을 가졌다. 이 자리에서 다을은 평소 누나에게 꼭 해주고 싶었던 요리를 직접 준비하며 특별한 의미를 전했다. 또 남매는 471일 만의 재회 소감을 솔직하게 털어놓으며 떨어져 있던 시간 동안의 진심을 고백했다. 이들의 속마음은 엄마 이윤진을 울컥하게...

Suspect dead after shots fired at, by police officers in Batavia, officials say
creator: WLS
content: BATAVIA, Ill. (WLS) -- A suspect died after shots were fired at and by police Saturday in the west suburbs. The shooting happened around 4 p.m. in the 1200 block of East Wilson Street in Batavia, police said. A 28-year-old man armed with a firearm allegedly fired at police officers, officials said. Officers also shot their weapons during the incident. The man died as a result of the incident, police said. He has not yet been identified. It was not yet known if the suspect died as a result of the officers' gunfire. Kane County Major Crimes Task Force is investigating the police-involved shooting. No further information was immediately available.

Hai nhà vô địch nữ truyền cảm hứng
creator: Đào Tùng
content: Gọi họ là những người truyền cảm hứng ở môn điền kinh kể cũng không quá lời, nếu biết huy chương vàng (HCV) quốc gia mà Nguyễn Thị Oanh giành được ở 4 nội dung sở trường đã chạm đến con số 39, còn Nguyễn Thị Thanh Phúc miệt mài làm "người vô đối" ở nội dung đi bộ nữ suốt 19 năm qua. Chiến thắng nghịch cảnh Nhắc đến Nguyễn Thị Oanh, cô gái vóc dáng nhỏ nhắn quê Bắc Giang nhưng từ lâu đã vươn tầm thành "người khổng lồ" của điền kinh Đông Nam Á, ai cũng nhớ nhiều nhất đến kỳ tích của cô tại SEA Games 32. Không chỉ liên tiếp chiến thắng các cự ly 1.500 m và 3.000 m vượt chướng ngại diễn ra chỉ cách nhau 20 phút, Oanh "ỉn" còn là vận động viên điền kinh đầu tiên giành 4 HCV cá nhân tại một kỳ SEA Games, tính chung cả nam lẫn nữ. Nguyễn Thị Oanh trên đường chạy 3.000 m vượt chướng ngại (ảnh trên) và Nguyễn Thị Thanh Phúc vô địch cự ly đi bộ 20 km nữ lần thứ 19 .Ảnh: HỒ ĐỨC Chiến tích "vượt vũ môn" tại Phnom Penh tháng 5-2023 cũng giúp Nguyễn Thị Oanh trở thành một trong những tượng đài của điền kinh Đông Nam Á, chủ nhân của 12 HCV qua các kỳ SEA Games, chỉ xếp sau Jennifer Tin Lay (Myanmar) với 15 ngôi vô địch. Ở đấu trường quốc nội, Nguyễn Thị Oanh gần như "vô đối" ở các cự ly sở...

title: 7 loại rau “khó bị sâu bệnh”, cực dễ trồng dễ chăm, ai sợ thuốc trừ sâu thì có thể tự trồng tại nhà
creator: Theo Mỹ Diệu
content: Nhiều người nghĩ rằng trồng rau đồng nghĩa với việc phải phun thuốc bảo vệ thực vật liên tục. Nhưng thực tế, thiên nhiên đã ưu ái ban tặng những loại rau “sinh ra đã có lá chắn”, sâu bọ ngửi mùi là tránh xa, chẳng cần nhọc công xịt thuốc. Mùa thu lại chính là vụ trồng vàng, và 7 loại rau dưới đây được xem là “khắc tinh của sâu bệnh”, cực kỳ phù hợp cho trồng tại gia, từ ban công chung cư đến vườn nhỏ ngoài sân. Tỏi chứa hoạt chất allicin có mùi hăng mạnh, khiến sâu xanh, rệp vườn phải “chạy mất dép”. Chỉ cần cắm vài tép xuống đất từ tháng 9-10, đầu xuân có thể thu ngồng tỏi, đến hè là đầy ắp tỏi củ trong bếp. Phần thân lá chẳng mấy khi bị sâu đụng, toàn bộ dinh dưỡng dồn xuống củ vàng óng dưới đất. Đặc biệt, loại này trồng một lần có thể để tự nhiên, ít phải chăm sóc. Chỉ cần cắt vài đoạn thân cắm xuống đất là bén rễ, mọc nhanh hơn cả tốc độ sâu kịp cắn. Từ lúc giâm cành đến khi hái ăn chỉ khoảng 10 ngày, càng hái non rau càng mọc khỏe. Bề mặt lá có lớp sáp bóng loáng, sâu bệnh khó bám. Trồng từ tháng 9, đến tháng 11 đã có thể thu hái, nấu xào với dầu hào ngon chẳng kém thịt cá. Trong lá hẹ có chất cay nồng, khiến ngay cả trứng sâu cũng ngại bám. Một...

전남도, 코로나 재유행 대비 ‘59개 대응팀’ 가동···“방역수칙 준수” 당부
creator: 고귀한 기자 go@kyunghyang.com
content: 전남도가 여름철 코로나19 재유행에 대비해 전담 대응기구를 가동하고 방역물품 비축, 의료기관 모니터링 확대 등 선제 대응에 나섰다. 전남도는 17일 “최근 5주간 도내 입원환자 중심 표본감시 결과, 주당 발생 건수가 0~3명 수준에 머물며 비교적 안정세를 보이고 있다”고 밝혔다. 전남의 주간 발생 건수는 27주차부터 31주차까지 각각 2명, 2명, 1명, 1명, 3명으로 소폭 변동을 보였다. 반면 전국적으로는 확산세가 뚜렷하다. 같은 기간 전국 221개 감시기관에서는 101명, 103명, 123명, 139명, 220명으로 꾸준히 증가하며 2배 이상 늘었다. 이에 따라 전남도는 방역 대응 체계를 한층 강화하고 있다.전남도는 지난 6월부터 코로나19 전담 대응기구 59개 팀(총 215명)을 운영하며 상시 모니터링 체계를 가동 중이다. 감염취약시설 및 의료계 전문가, 시군 보건소 관계자 등과의 자문회의도 세 차례 개최해 현장 의견을 반영한 방역 보완책을 마련했다. 마스크 20만개, 진단키트 2만개 등 비상 방역물품을 비축한 데 이어, 2025~2026절기 코로나19 백신 26만1000명분도 확보한 상태다. 현재 확보된 치료제는 먹는 약 1412명분, 주사제 126명분 등 총 1538명분으로, 1일 평균 사용량(약 6.5명분)을 감안하면 안정적 수준이다. 전남도는 앞으로 시군 보건소를 통해 감염취약시설 733곳에 마스크 5만 개, 진단키트 1만 개, 소독제 1만 개 등 총 7만 개의 방역물품을 긴급 배정할 계획이다. 의료기관 모니터링 대상도 기존 45곳에서 112곳으로...

title: 习近平牵挂的塞罕坝 创造“荒原变林海”的人间奇迹
creator: chinanews
content: 视频:学习·知行丨“两山”回响 习近平牵挂的塞罕坝 创造“荒原变林海”的人间奇迹 来源:人民网-中国共产党新闻网 “塞罕坝”是蒙汉合璧语,意为“美丽的高岭”。由于开围放垦、连年山火,这里一度沦为“黄沙遮天日,飞鸟无栖树”的荒原。为了防风固沙,守护家园,国家决定在这片荒原上建林场,筑起绿色屏障。1962年,369名风华正茂的青年从全国18个省(市)奔赴而来,他们怀揣着“向沙宣战”的信念扎下根去。三代人接续奋斗,创造出“荒原变林海”的人间奇迹。 2017年8月,习近平总书记对河北塞罕坝林场建设者感人事迹作出重要指示,称赞“他们的事迹感人至深,是推进生态文明建设的一个生动范例”。2021年8月23日,习近平总书记在考察塞罕坝机械林场时,强调“要传承好塞罕坝精神,深刻理解和落实生态文明理念”。 从一棵树苗的倔强扎根,到百万亩人工林海的碧波荡漾,塞罕坝的每一寸绿意都在诉说着奋斗的故事。如今,塞罕坝精神早已在中华大地落地生根,正不断续写新时代人与自然和谐共生的动人篇章。 文案、制作:赵明妍、彭晓玲、席彪 拍摄支持:李兆民、孟浩宇(实习) 配音:詹伟业 鸣谢:河北省林业和草原局、承德市委宣传部、河北省塞罕坝机械林场、围场满族蒙古族自治县 部分素材来源:人民日报、新华社、央视网

title: Ara Damansara’s Ee Hiong Hakka Yong Tau Foo serves up ‘yong tau foo’ the traditional way – stuffed with fish paste, minced pork and salted fish!
content: PETALING JAYA, Aug 17 — When in search of rustic, hearty and satisfying food, the vast suburban wilderness of Ara Damansara, with its million-ringgit bungalows sealed behind gates and guards, its broad and empty roads, and the endless traffic lights that seem to lead to more traffic lights, may not be the first neighbourhood that comes to mind. Yet despite the cushy existence their surroundings suggest, the wealth of kopitiams and roadside gerai in the area shows that the residents here still eat much like everyone else, firmly rooted on planet Earth.One such enclave for this kind of food is the Ara Permata Business Centre, home to kopitiams alongside newer cafes and restaurants. There’s no sign, but Ee Hiong is located in the Ara Permata Business Centre, next to a branch of BM Yam Rice. Here you’ll find Ee Hiong Hakka Yong Tau Foo, right next to a branch of the famous BM Yam Rice. Hakka yong tau foo is one of those dishes that I feel both benefits and suffers from its widespread availability; its popularity makes it easy to find across the Klang Valley, but the pressures of staying competitive in such a saturated market mean it can be hard to find really, really good yong tau foo done the traditional Hakka way. Classically, the filling should be a combination of fish paste, minced pork and salted fish, but rising costs have led most places to omit the salted fish, and sometimes the pork as well. Ee Hiong, however, takes pride in holding to the old formula, with a filling...
