title: 보건소 의사 10년간 41% 줄어..."농어촌 의료 접근성 악화"
creator: 주혜린
content: 보건소와 보건지소에 근무하는 의사 수가 10년 만에 40% 넘게 급감한 것으로 나타났다. 17일 보건복지부 '보건소 및 보건지소 운영현황'에 따르면 지난해 전국 보건소·보건지소·보건진료소에 근무한 의사(소장 포함, 한의사·치과의사 제외)는 1400명이었다. 이는 2014년 2386명과 비교해 41.3% 감소한 수준이다. 2023년(1,660명)보다도 15.7%가 줄었다. 보건소 근무 의사는 2014년 962명에서 지난해 627명으로 34.8% 급감했다. 같은 기간 보건지소·보건진료소 근무 의사는 1424명에서 지난해 773명으로 45.7% 줄었다. 이런 상황이 계속되면 공공 의료기관 의존도가 높은 농어촌 지역 주민의 의료 접근성이 더 악화할 수 있다는 지적이 나온다. 보건소·지소 의사 수 감소는 민간에 비해 낮은 연봉·처우, 열악한 정주 여건 등에 따른 기피 현상과 공중보건의사 감소 등이 복합적으로 작용한 결과일 수 있다는 분석이 나온다. 공중보건의사는 의사·치과의사·한의사 자격이 있는 남성이 현역병으로 입대하는 대신 3년간 지역 보건의료 의사로 복무하는 제도다. 보건소 인력 구성 현황(보건지소·진료소 제외)을 보면, 보건소에서 근무하는 공중보건의는 2014년 955명에서 지난해 677명으로 29.1% 줄었다. 특히 의사 공중보건의가 525명에서 239명으로 큰 폭(54.5%)으로 감소했습. 치과의사 공중보건의는 184명에서 257명으로 39.7% 늘었다. 한의사 공중보건의는 246명에서 181명으로 26.4% 감소했다. 의대 입학생 중 여학생 비율 증가, 의대 재학생의 현역병 지원 증가 등의...

title: Fan’s Conduct At G-Dragon’s Recent Concert Sparks Heated Backlash
creator: Serah S. Cherrie
content: BIGBANG member G-Dragon ‘s recent concert has become a hot topic after the idol faced a shocking moment while interacting with fans in the audience. Recently, the idol held three back-to-back concerts in Hong Kong as a part of his Übermensch World Tour . During one of the shows, when he came down from the stage to interact with some fans in the front row, one of them threw a bunch of fake money at him, leaving the idol visibly startled. The action has since sparked a huge backlash online. Many pointed out that throwing money at performers was often seen as a disrespectful gesture in Korean and other Asian cultures, while throwing fake money was even worse. In many cultures, including Korea, China, Vietnam, and Taiwan, fake currency often resembles joss paper, or “hell money” used in funeral rites to send offerings to the deceased. Hence, throwing it at a living person is seen as highly offensive and ominous. According to reports, the fan who threw the fake money at G-Dragon later apologized on Xiaohongshu , explaining that they did it just as a playful gesture without fully understanding the cultural implications behind it. Despite the apology, the debates around such fan behavior continued on social media, with many pointing out that there was a widespread problem of a lack of etiquette among G-Dragon’s concert-goers. The amount of disrespect GD received from those so-called CFAMs is just too much. Throwing fake money at time. Bringing led banner that involved his former...

title: ‘Awful’...Referee Jason Herzog scolded again by UFC fans after quick stoppage during UFC 319 prelims
creator: Curtis Calhoun
content: Referee Jason Herzog came under a microscope yet again after a controversial stoppage at UFC 319.UFC lightweights Chase Hooper and Alexander Hernandez helped kick things off during the UFC 319 prelims on Saturday in Chicago. Both lightweights were looking to move a step closer to the Top 15, especially Hooper, following three straight victories.The UFC 319 prelims began with a stunning upset by Joseph Morales, followed by questionable scorecards that left Daniel Cormier flabbergasted. As the main card drew closer, Hooper and Hernandez looked to make a statement in their returns to the Octagon.While one of the combatants earned a highlight-reel finish, it was marred by another controversial stoppage from referee Jason Herzog.LIVE: UFC 319 Dricus Du Plessis vs Khamzat Chimaev LIVE: Stream info, results, videos and more from middleweight title clashPhoto by Ed Mulholland/Zuffa LLCUFC fans blast referee Jason Herzog after another questionable stoppage at UFC 319 Hernandez and Hooper started the fight with a closely-contested back-and-forth war, with Hooper repeatedly trying to get the fight to the ground and Hernandez opting to keep the fight standing. In the final minute, Hernandez poured on the pressure and found his range with a pair of nasty body shots to Hooper that left him visibly stunned.With less than five seconds left in Round 1, Hernandez dropped Hooper with a right hand, followed by a few ground strikes just before the buzzer. But despite Hooper continuing to work...

title: Akie Iwai of Japan shoots 64 in Portland to take lead in bid for first LPGA Tour title
creator: The Canadian Press
content: PORTLAND, Ore. (AP) — Akie Iwai of Japan eagled the fifth hole and birdied the other three par 5s at Columbia Edgewater, shooting an 8-under 64 on Saturday to take a two-stroke lead in The Standard Portland Classic. Iwai is trying to join twin sister Chisato as an LPGA Tour winner this year after second-place finishes in Thailand in February and Los Angeles in April. She put on a ball-striking exhibition Saturday in mostly calm conditions on the tree-lined course, hitting to 3 feet to set up the eagle and twice to a foot for birdie — the last on the par-4 18th to get to 18-under 198. “My style, my golf style, is aggressive,” she said. “That’s why no change this week. Also, aim to the pin — boom! boom! Every shot, every hole. That’s it.” Grace Kim of Australia was second after a 67. She holed a 156-yard shot for eagle from the left rough on the par-4 17th. “I was trying to see if I could get a drop,” Kim said. “I wasn’t entirely over the sprinkler-head boxes so you knew I just had to hit it. Leaked right again. I was like, `Oh, please get through the rough.' Somehow went in the hole, so I guess a little bit of luck in there.” Linn Grant was 14 under after a 65. The Swede won the 2023 Dana Open for her lone LPGA Tour title. “Tried to go out and just be, I wouldn’t say happy, but just accepting of whatever today would bring,” Grant said. “I think I played very mature and just had a lot of fun.” Gurleen Kaur had a 70 to get to 13 under, and Aditi Ashok (65) was another stroke...

title: Warga Ikut Upacara HUT ke-80 RI di Istana Dapat Suvenir, Ini Isinya
creator: Firda Cynthia Anggrainy
content: Jakarta Masyarakat yang telah mendapat undangan berbondong-bondong menghadiri rangkaian upacara HUT ke-80 RI di Istana Merdeka, Jakarta pagi ini. Masyarakat menerima suvenir dengan berbagai cenderamata bernuansa merah putih. Pantauan detikcom , Minggu (17/8/2025), warga menerima suvenir tepat setelah melewati X-ray di akses masuk menuju lapangan Istana Merdeka. Suvenir itu dibungkus dalam tas goodiebag. Tas suvenir tersebut berisi topi, kaos, payung dan kipas yang bernuansa merah putih dengan tulisan HUT ke-80 RI. Di dalam tas itu juga terdapat buku Kepemimpinan Militer yang ditulis Prabowo. SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT Foto: Masyarakat menerima suvenir dengan berbagai cenderamata bernuansa merah putih saat tiba di Istana Merdeka Jakarta untuk menghadiri HUT ke-80 RI. (Firda/detikcom). Baca juga: Yuk Pakai Transum! TransJ, MRT, LRT, KRL Cuma Rp 80 Hari Ini dan Besok Diketahui, upacara Peringatan Detik-detik Proklamasi Kemerdekaan RI akan dilaksanakan pada pukul 10.00 WIB. Presiden Prabowo akan memimpin upacara tersebut. ADVERTISEMENT Selain upacara bendera di Istana Merdeka, ada juga kirab bendera, pesta rakyat hingga malam perayaan HUT ke-80 RI. title: Mets rookie McLean shows off arsenal, athleticism in impressive debut
creator: Jerry Beach, The Associated Press
content: NEW YORK (AP) — New York Mets manager Carlos Mendoza turned to bench coach John Gibbons as they watched pitcher Nolan McLean get into his first big league jam on Saturday. “I think I told Gibbons ‘All right, let’s see what we’ve got here right away,’” Mendoza said. The Mets might have themselves a keeper. The 24-year-old right-hander made a highlight reel double play to escape the third inning and earned the win in his major league debut on Saturday when he tossed 5 1/3 scoreless frames to help the Mets to a much-needed 3-1 victory over the Seattle Mariners. McLean allowed two hits, walked four and struck out eight in the longest scoreless outing by a Mets starter since June 11, when David Peterson shut out the Washington Nationals. New York’s rotation entered Saturday averaging 4.96 innings per appearance. “We needed that — as a team, as an organization, given where we’re at and how hard it’s been for us,” Mendoza said after the Mets won for just the third time in 17 games. McLean showed off a five-pitch arsenal that included a high-70s curveball, a high-80s sweeper, a 90-mph cutter and sinkers and fastballs both measured in the high 90s. He limited the Mariners to one hit in 10 plate appearances with a runner on base. The former two-way player — a third-round pick of the Mets out of Oklahoma State in 2023 — also displayed his athleticism in the third. McLean walked J.P. Crawford and Cole Young before Cal Raleigh’s one-out single loaded the bases for Julio Rodríguez, who...

title: Steelers rookie Derrick Harmon destroys Buccaneers' Ben Scott for first sack in Pittsburgh
creator: Steelers Wire
content: Roll out the red carpet — Derrick Harmon has officially arrived on the Steelers stat sheet, earning his first team sack against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in preseason.With just over a minute remaining in the first quarter, Harmon completely bullied Buccaneers rookie LG Ben Scott — driving him into the backfield with ease, sacking QB Kyle Trask in the process.The rook takes him down 💪 @DerrickHarmon20📺 #TBvsPIT on @KDKA@paramountpluspic.twitter.com/WSLTT01CgS— Pittsburgh Steelers (@steelers) August 16, 2025Selected by the Steelers with the 20th overall pick in the first round of the 2025 NFL Draft, it didn’t take Harmon long to earn the starting defensive end spot — and he’s clearly ready for the big lights, as evidenced by his impressive sack on Saturday.Steelers fans are still holding onto hope that veteran DT Cam Heyward, who’s mentored Harmon early in his development process, will return to action sooner rather than later — as he’s currently sitting out of team activities in pursuit of a new deal.For up-to-date Steelers coverage, follow us on X @TheSteelersWire and give our Facebook page a like.This article originally appeared on Steelers Wire: Steelers' Derrick Harmon destroys Buccaneers' Ben Scott for first sack

title: 이대호, 안정환에 불만 폭발 “운동부라 불러놓고 개고생만”
creator: 이수진
content: 사진제공ᅵMBC 이대호가 안정환을 향해 불만을 쏟아냈다. 18일 방송되는 MBC 예능 ‘푹 쉬면 다행이야’ 61회에서는 ‘안CEO’ 안정환과 운동부 이대호, 이대형, 이대은, 김남일이 무인도에서 레스토랑을 운영하는 모습이 공개된다. 스튜디오에는 붐, 셰프 정호영, 코요태 신지, 골든차일드 이장준이 함께한다. 40도에 가까운 폭염 속 무인도를 찾은 운동부 멤버들은 도착 직후부터 불만을 터뜨렸다. 특히 이대호는 “꼭 운동부는 폭염 때 불러서 개고생 시킨다. 안정환은 맨날 부려먹기만 한다”며 강하게 항의해 웃음을 자아냈다. 사진제공ᅵMBC 이어 안정환은 운동부를 위한 ‘맞춤형’ 초대형 미션을 준비했다. 무려 1톤에 달하는 작업물이 등장하자, 이대호는 “내가 125kg인데도 감당이 안 된다”며 난색을 표했다. 하지만 안정환은 “운동부가 해야지, 다른 사람은 못 한다”며 강하게 밀어붙였다. 또한 금어기가 풀린 문어를 잡기 위해 ‘쓰리대’ 형제 이대호·이대형·이대은과 김남일이 해루질에 나섰다. 잠수 끝에 문어를 발견한 이대형은 기대를 모았으나, 건져 올린 것은 다리뿐이었다. 이어 또다시 문어 다리만 나오자 현장은 폭소와 허탈함으로 가득 찼다. 과연 이대형이 문어 다리를 모두 모아 ‘문어 완전체’를 만들어낼 수 있을지 궁금증이 커지고 있다. 운동부 특집의 땀과 웃음 가득한 무인도 도전기는 18일 밤 9시에 방송된다. 이수진 기자 sujinl22@donga.com Copyright © 스포츠동아. title: EN VIVO - LPF Torneo Clausura 2025| Plaza Amador vs Sporting San Miguelito: Partido de la jornada 5 por TVMAX
creator: Fermín Estribí
content: Un r invicto recibe en el al en un parido correspondiente a la cartelera sabatina de la del que puedes ver a través de , y el canal de YouTube . Con tres victorias en igual cantidad de juegos, el es el actual líder de la . En la campaña donde defiende el título de campeón obtenido en el certamen Apertura de este año, ha tenido un paso firme el que espera mantener en esta jornada. Por su parte el tuvo un inicio complicado con dos derrotas en las dos primeras jornadas. Luego de eso venció al y empató con el la semana pasada por lo que llega a este encuentro con cuatro puntos. Su será sumar una victoria que le permita meterse de lleno en la pelea por un cupo en la siguiente etapa del certamen. En que han tenido, ambos equipos suman dos victorias y tienen un empate. El domingo 17 de agosto también tendrá dos compromisos. A las , en el Estadio Gustavo Posam, medirá fuerzas con , en un choque que podría marcar el rumbo de ambos en la mitad de la tabla. Más tarde, a las , el se enfrentará al recién ascendido en el Estadio Muquita Sánchez. Los Vikingos buscarán imponer su experiencia, pero Nacional ya ha demostrado que puede competirle a cualquiera. La jornada concluirá el con el choque entre y , a disputarse en el Complejo Deportivo Los Andes desde las . Ambos equipos buscarán cerrar la fecha con una victoria que los mantenga en la pelea por los primeros puestos.

Мошенники начали звонить россиянам под видом операторов сотовой связи
creator: RT на русском
content: В России мошенники начали звонить гражданам, представляясь сотрудниками кол-центра их сотового оператора. Как отмечает РИА Новости, злоумышленники заявляют, что номер человека находится якобы в реестре «серых» сим-карт и в ближайшее время может быть заблокирован. В связи с этим, по словам аферистов, необходимо назвать свои личные данные, среди которых ФИО, номер ИНН и др.. Затем, по информации агентства, мошенники якобы для закрепления номера за жертвой просят её назвать код из смс, после чего получают доступ в личный кабинет. В МВД ранее предупредили, что мошенники начали рассылать поддельные скриншоты из якобы приложения банка. Также в ведомстве подчеркнули, что уведомления и смс о входе на «Госуслуги» присылают только мошенники.

title: Trump gives Putin ‘peace letter’ from wife Melania
creator: AFP
content: US President Donald Trump handed Vladimir Putin a special item at their Alaska summit: a letter written by his wife, First Lady Melania Trump, pleading for the Russian leader to make peace in the name of children. The first lady’s office on Saturday reposted a Fox News article on X containing the short letter, a day after Trump and Putin failed to find a breakthrough at their high-stakes meeting. Putin read the “peace letter” immediately after Trump handed it to him, while delegations from both sides looked on, according to Fox News. “In today’s world, some children are forced to carry a quiet laughter, untouched by the darkness around them,” read the letter, which was signed by the first lady and did not mention Ukraine by name. “Mr Putin, you can singlehandedly restore their melodic laughter,” it added. “In protecting the innocence of these children, you will do more than serve Russia alone — you serve humanity itself.” “Such a bold idea transcends all human division, and you, Mr Putin, are fit to implement this vision with a stroke of the pen today,” the letter read. “It is time.” In July, the US president had said that his wife, who was born in Slovenia, had helped change his thinking about Putin. “I go home, I tell the first lady, ‘you know, I spoke to Vladimir today, we had a wonderful conversation,'” Trump said. “And she said, ‘Oh really? Another city was just hit.'” Trump attempted a rapprochement with Putin shortly after starting his second term, having campaigned...

title: Dan prisión preventiva a 2 hombres por robo de tractocamión en Cuernavaca
creator: HAldama
content: Cuernavaca.- Autoridades en Morelos lograron la prisión preventiva contra Javier “N” y Alsibiades “N”, acusados de secuestro exprés agravado, robo de vehículo automotor agravado y robo calificado, tras interceptar y despojar de un tractocamión a dos operadores en una zona transitada de la capital morelense. Los hechos ocurrieron el martes 12 de agosto, cuando los imputados abordaron el vehículo pesado que circulaba por el bulevar Cuauhnáhuac, a la altura del paso a desnivel de Jacarandas, en la colonia Ricardo Flores Magón. El hecho quedó plasmado en un video, cuando uno de los asaltantes intercepta al conductor del tractocamión Posteriormente, los sospechosos privaron de su libertad a los conductores durante el asalto, lo que agravó los cargos en su contra. La intervención de las autoridades fue clave para la detención. Elementos del Grupo de Recuperación de Vehículos de la Agencia de Investigación Criminal (AIC), en coordinación con la Secretaría de Seguridad y Protección Ciudadana (SSPC) de Morelos, llevaron a cabo un operativo que permitió asegurar a los presuntos responsables. Horas después, se ejecutó una orden de aprehensión en su contra. Durante la audiencia inicial ante un juez de control, se decretó la prisión preventiva como medida cautelar para ambos imputados, quienes permanecerán recluidos mientras se desarrolla el proceso. La defensa solicitó la duplicidad del término constitucional para la audiencia de vinculación a proceso, lo que...

title: Concesión del Canal 1: esto dice la ley sobre su vigencia, en contradicción con lo afirmado por Gustavo Petro
creator: Licsa Gómez
content: El viernes 5 de agosto, durante un Consejo de Ministros, el presidente Gustavo Petro sorprendió con una directriz sobre el Canal Uno. “El ministro [TIC] tiene la orden de empezar la licitación del Canal 1, una nueva forma de manejar la televisión, que no es del Gobierno, pero tampoco del potentado económico. Debe ser de la juventud, desde la gente, de la cultura, del arte, etcétera”, afirmó el mandatario.La instrucción fue interpretada por sectores políticos y de medios de comunicación como un intento de “expropiación” y como un riesgo para la libertad de prensa y el pluralismo informativo. El Canal Uno es actualmente operado por Plural Comunicaciones, una alianza empresarial que ganó la licitación pública en 2017.Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp ChannelAnte la declaración presidencial, Ramiro Avendaño, presidente del Canal 1, respondió con firmeza: “La concesión de Canal 1 está vigente hasta mayo del 2037 por ley de la República. Además, desconocemos las intenciones políticas detrás del matoneo sistemático con un medio libre y plural que defiende la democracia, la libertad de prensa y representa los intereses de todos los colombianos”.Lo que dicen la ley y el contrato vigenteLa historia de la concesión actual se remonta a 2016, cuando la Autoridad Nacional de Televisión (Antv) abrió el proceso licitatorio. En abril de 2017, el contrato fue adjudicado a Plural Comunicaciones, integrado por CM&, NTC, RTI y HMTV1. El oferente...

title: 黑龙江省18个边境城市旅游市场持续火爆
creator: chinanews
content: 中新网 虎林8月17日电 (记者 王琳)黑龙江省边境(界江界湖)旅游消费季活动于16日在鸡西虎林市启幕。记者从主办方黑龙江省文化和旅游厅获悉,该省边境地区旅游市场持续火爆,2025年上半年18个边境县(市、区)接待游客1609.79万人次,游客总花费95.44亿元(人民币,下同),同比分别增长24.72%、36.09%。 黑龙江省与俄罗斯毗邻,边境线长约2981千米,拥有大界江、大界湖,以及“北极”漠河、“东极”抚远、边城虎林等18个边境县(市、区),是中国对俄开放合作前沿。近年来,黑龙江省边境(界江界湖)旅游联盟发挥区域资源整合作用,丰富产品,开拓市场,提升服务,完善设施,合力打造边境旅游靓丽品牌。 本次活动以“助力向北开放,带动兴边富民,赋能县域经济”为主题,召开第二届黑龙江省边境(界江界湖)旅游联盟年会和座谈会,组织现场经验交流,举办边境旅游大集,推出边境旅游新体验、新业态,边境文旅人气足、消费旺。 根据携程集团合作拓展部北区大区副总经理、合作拓展部黑龙江总经理高珊发布的边境旅游发展指数显示,2024年黑龙江省在线边境旅游人次同比增长194.88%,在线边境旅游消费金额同比增长206.04%。2025年1月至7月,继续保持高速增长态势。 活动期间,黑龙江省文化和旅游厅与黑龙江出入境边防检查总站签订战略合作框架协议,黑龙江省边境(界江界湖)旅游促消费季暨兴边富民行动创新推进试点(边境旅游提质增效方向)工作正式启动,黑龙江大学旅游产业发展研究中心发布黑龙江边境地区旅游发展理论与实践研究成果。 据悉,下一步,黑龙江边境旅游联盟将在产品创新上深耕“边境特色+沉浸体验”,在服务上聚焦专业能力提升,在营销推广上打造“精准触达+场景共鸣”,加快推动边境旅游高质量发展。 作为本次活动的举办地,虎林市隔乌苏里江与俄罗斯相望。虎林市文旅局负责人林忠辉说:“我们推出界江游精品线路,还会推出文旅消费惠民政策,真正让好风光变成好产业。”(完)

title: La otra cara del milagro económico de Sánchez: por qué los asalariados españoles son más pobres que en 2019
creator: Eduardo Ortega Socorro
content: Aunque el PIB español crece más que la media de la UE , hay otros indicadores que señalan que hay puntos negros en la economía nacional. Este es el caso de la tasa de paro, que sigue siendo la más elevada entre los Estados miembros, pese a que el mercado laboral se acerca ya a los 22 millones de ocupados . Así, la macroeconomía española exhibe luces y sombras . Y las luces no terminan de llegar a la microeconomía. Los trabajadores españoles se han empobrecido respecto a 2019, primer año completo de Pedro Sánchez al frente del Gobierno de España . Según indican los datos del Instituto Nacional de Estadística (INE) y estimaciones de organizaciones como Adecco o incluso la OCU, los salarios no han crecido al mismo ritmo que los precios y han perdido poder adquisitivo. El poder adquisitivo supone la cantidad de bienes o servicios que puede comprar una persona según los ingresos que se tengan y los precios que se puedan pagar. Si dichos ingresos no suben en la misma proporción que los precios, se pierde poder adquisitivo . NEWSLETTER - INVERTIA Este es el caso de los trabajadores españoles en los últimos años. Según se desprende de los datos de la oficina estadística española, el aumento de los salarios no ha logrado compensar la evolución de la inflación. Acelerados por los efectos de la guerra en Ucrania, los precios han crecido de 2019 a 2024 más de un 21%. Los sueldos no han podido seguir este ritmo. title: സപ്ലൈകോയിൽ പ്രത്യേക വിലക്കുറവ്, ഓഗസ്റ്റ് 24 വരെ മാത്രം; ഹാപ്പി അവേഴ്സ് ഓഫർ ലഭിക്കാൻ ചെയ്യേണ്ടത്
creator: Bibin Babu
content: തിരുവനന്തപുരം: ഓണത്തിന് മുന്നോടിയായി സപ്ലൈകോ വില്പനശാലകളിൽ ഉൽപ്പന്നങ്ങൾക്ക് വിലക്കുറവ്. ഹാപ്പി അവേഴ്സ് എന്ന പേരിൽ ഓഗസ്റ്റ് 24 വരെ ഉച്ചയ്ക്ക് രണ്ടു മുതൽ നാലു വരെയാണ് തെരഞ്ഞെടുത്ത സബ്സിഡി ഇതര ഭക്ഷ്യവസ്തുക്കൾക്ക് വിലക്കുറവ് നൽകുന്നത്. സപ്ലൈകോയിൽ സാധാരണ ലഭിക്കുന്ന വിലക്കുറവിനെക്കാൾ 10 ശതമാനം വരെ വിലക്കുറവ് വിവിധ ഉൽപ്പന്നങ്ങൾക്ക് ലഭിക്കും. വെളിച്ചെണ്ണയടക്കമുള്ള ശബരി ഉൽപ്പന്നങ്ങൾ, സോപ്പ്, ശർക്കര, ആട്ട, റവ , മൈദ, ഡിറ്റർജന്റുകൾ , ടൂത്ത് പേസ്റ്റ് സാനിറ്ററി നാപ്കിൻ, തുടങ്ങിയവയ്ക്ക് അധിക വിലക്കുറവ് ഉണ്ട്. വിവിധ സ്ഥാപനങ്ങൾക്കും വ്യക്തികൾക്കും തങ്ങളുടെ ടീം അംഗങ്ങൾക്ക് ഓണസമ്മാനമായി നൽകാൻ സപ്ലൈകോ ഇത്തവണ ഗിഫ്റ്റ് കാർഡുകളും വിവിധ കിറ്റുകളും പുറത്തിറക്കിയിട്ടുണ്ട്. 18 ഇനങ്ങൾ അടങ്ങിയ സമൃദ്ധി കിറ്റ്, 10 ഇനങ്ങൾ അടങ്ങിയ സമൃദ്ധി മിനി കിറ്റ്, 9 ശബരി ഉത്പന്നങ്ങൾ അടങ്ങിയ ശബരി സിഗ്നേച്ചർ കിറ്റ് എന്നിവയാണ് സപ്ലൈകോ നൽകുന്ന കിറ്റുകൾ. കൂടാതെ 500 രൂപയുടെയും 1000 രൂപയുടെയും ഗിഫ്റ്റ് കാർഡുകളും വിതരണത്തിനായി തയ്യാറാണ്. അഞ്ഞൂറ് രൂപയുടെയോ ആയിരം രൂപയുടെയോ ഗിഫ്റ്റ് കാർഡുകൾ ഉപയോഗിച്ച് സപ്ലൈകോയുടെ വില്പനശാലകളിൽ നിന്ന് ഉപഭോക്താവിന് ആവശ്യമുള്ള നിത്യോപയോഗ സാധനങ്ങൾ ഒക്ടോബർ 31വരെ വാങ്ങാം. ഓണത്തോടനുബന്ധിച്ച് 1225 രൂപ വിലയുള്ള സമൃദ്ധി കിറ്റ് ആയിരം രൂപയ്ക്കും, 625 രൂപ വിലയുള്ള സമൃദ്ധി മിനി കിറ്റ് 500 രൂപയ്ക്കും, 305 രൂപ വിലയുള്ള ശബരി സിഗ്നേച്ചർ കിറ്റ് 229 രൂപയ്ക്കും ആണ് സപ്ലൈകോ നൽകുന്നത്. ഓണക്കാലത്ത് ജീവനക്കാർക്ക് സമ്മാനങ്ങൾ നൽകുന്ന സ്വകാര്യ സ്ഥാപനങ്ങൾക്കും, റസിഡൻസ് അസോസിയേഷനുകൾക്കും, ദുർബല വിഭാഗങ്ങൾക്ക് കിറ്റുകൾ വിതരണം ചെയ്യുന്ന വെൽഫെയർ സ്ഥാപനങ്ങൾക്കും സപ്ലൈകോയുടെ ഈ പുതിയ സംവിധാനം ഉപയോഗിക്കാവുന്നതാണ്....

title: 126 mẫu camera an ninh có thể khiến bạn bị quay lén, có nhiều người Việt dùng
creator: Theo Huỳnh Duy
content: Dahua là một trong những thương hiệu rất phổ biến tại Việt Nam. (Ảnh minh hoạ) Do đó, người dùng cần thực hiện các bước cập nhật firmware một cách khẩn cấp, truy cập vào trang web chính thức của Dahua tại đây, kiểm tra xem model camera của bạn có nằm trong danh sách 126 mẫu bị ảnh hưởng hay không và tải về bản cập nhật firmware mới nhất. Giải pháp tạm thời (nếu chưa thể cập nhật) là nên ngắt kết nối camera khỏi việc truy cập Internet trực tiếp, tắt tính năng UPnP trên router mạng và cô lập hệ thống camera trên một mạng riêng biệt để giảm thiểu rủi ro. Cả Bitdefender và Dahua đều nhấn mạnh rằng, một khi thông tin về lỗ hổng đã được công bố công khai, bất kỳ thiết bị nào chưa được vá lỗi và đang kết nối với Internet đều trở thành mục tiêu hàng đầu của tin tặc.

title: Giải mã bí ẩn: Vì sao vua chúa Trung Hoa ngủ trên chiếc giường hẹp chỉ 1m?
creator: Thanh Huyền
content: Phim cung đấu Trung Quốc thường khiến khán giả tò mò về cuộc sống xa hoa của hoàng gia. Tuy nhiên, một chi tiết ít ai để ý lại gây ngạc nhiên: các vị vua uy quyền, sống trong cung điện rộng lớn, lại chỉ nằm trên chiếc giường hẹp, chỉ rộng khoảng 1m. Điều này không chỉ áp dụng với hoàng đế mà cả hoàng hậu và phi tần cũng vậy. Vậy đâu là lý do đằng sau sự lựa chọn tưởng chừng không thoải mái này? Đây là một trong những lý do quan trọng nhất. Người xưa, đặc biệt là các vị vua, luôn khao khát sự trường thọ. Trong tiếng Trung, từ "giường" (床) có phát âm gần giống với "trường" (长), và từ "hẹp" (瘦) lại đồng âm với "thọ" (寿). Vì thế, việc sử dụng "giường hẹp" được coi là một cách gửi gắm mong ước "trường thọ" (长寿). Niềm tin tâm linh này đã ảnh hưởng sâu sắc đến việc lựa chọn kích thước giường không chỉ trong hoàng cung mà cả trong giới quý tộc. Trong kiến trúc phong kiến Trung Hoa, đặc biệt là khu vực tẩm điện (phòng ngủ) của vua, việc xây dựng phòng quá rộng bị cho là không tốt. Quan niệm xưa cho rằng phòng ngủ nhỏ sẽ mang lại may mắn và sức khỏe cho chủ nhân. Do đó, phòng ngủ trong cung cấm thường được thiết kế khá nhỏ gọn, diện tích thường không quá 10m2. Để hài hòa với...

title: Warm Home Discount recipients need to check one detail that can make them ineligible
creator: Samantha Leathers
content: As the UK basks in another heatwave, some households need to start planning for winter and the increased heating bills that come with it. Eligible households can look forward to a bit of relief from the Warm Home Discount scheme , but the government is urging them to ensure the correct person is named on their electricity bill before 24 August. The Warm Home Discount offers a one-off £150 discount on your electricity bill. It's usually applied automatically, but some may need to apply through their energy supplier or after receiving an eligibility letter between October and January. To receive the automatic £150 savings, the person named on the electricity bill must be receiving a qualifying means-tested benefit. This could spell trouble for some households. For instance, those who have recently moved house or switched suppliers and haven't yet updated the name on their bill. People using pre-payment meters also need to ensure their household account is registered in the correct name. Sunday, 24 August is the qualifying date for this benefit. This is when suppliers will begin using customer records to determine who qualifies for the discount automatically. Eligible households should aim to get the right person named on the bill before this date to ensure they receive their £150 discount automatically. If you don't meet the deadline, you may still be able to get the discount but will need to wait for a letter informing you of your eligibility before you apply. Minister for...

title: 現代自動車・起亜 中東最大市場のサウジで「快走」(聯合ニュース)
サッカー=浅野先発のマジョルカ黒星スタート、久保は同点ゴール
creator: ロイター編集
content: [バルセロナ 16日 ロイター] - サッカーのスペイン1部は16日、各地で開幕節の試合を行い、浅野拓磨が先発したマジョルカは昨季王者バルセロナに0─3で敗れ、黒星スタートとなった。 マジョルカは前半7分にラフィーニャに決められると、同23分にはフェラン・トーレスの加点を許し、2点ビハインドに。同33分にマヌ・モルラネスが2枚目のイエローで退場となると、その6分後にはベダト・ムリキが一発レッドの判定を受け、前半のうちに2選手を失う。 9人で戦ったマジョルカは一矢報いることができないまま、後半アディショナルタイム4分にラミン・ヤマルにネットを揺らされ、完敗となった。浅野は前半のみで退いた。 なお、バルセロナでは、後半24分にマンチェスター・ユナイテッド(イングランド)から期限付き移籍で加入したマーカス・ラッシュフォードがデビューした。イングランド出身選手がバルセロナのトップチームでプレーするのは、1989年のゲーリー・リネカー氏以来。 レアル・ソシエダードの久保建英はバレンシア戦に先発し、0─1の劣勢で迎えた後半15分に同点弾をマーク。エリア外でボールを受けると、ゴール正面から左足で強烈なミドルを決めた。久保は同35分までプレーし、試合は1─1のドローに終わった。

title: Ángel Gari, el último cazador de brujas del Pirineo, es ciego y tiene 81 años: "Hacen brebaje de sapo pero no pactan con Satán"
creator: Ferran Barber
content: El último "gran cazador de brujas" se llama Ángel Gari Lacruz y es completamente ciego. Setenta y cuatro años han pasado desde que una meningitis feroz le privó de la visión y aún recuerda todavía las siluetas de las montañas del Pirineo que dominaban el horizonte por el norte desde la plaza de la catedral de Huesca , su ciudad natal. A raíz de esa enfermedad, se quedó también paralizado por completo. Le faltó muy poco para perder la vida. Su padre, un maestro republicano, se desvivió junto a su madre buscando un tratamiento en Madrid, Alemania y en la América de Harry S. Truman . Recuperó parte de la movilidad, pero nunca la vista. Y, con todo, halló la forma de dedicar el resto de su existencia a investigar la brujería, a la sombra, entre otros, del que tiene por mentor e inspirador: Julio Caro Baroja. Los aragoneses le conocen bien, pero en el resto del país se sabe poco de él pese a sus galones intelectuales. A mediados de semana EL ESPAÑOL le llamó con motivo de la preocupación suscitada por la clausura del que ha sido uno de los proyectos que ha dado sentido a su vida: un museo de creencias y religiosidad popular situado en la abadía de un pueblecito del Prepirineo oscense llamado Abizanda. Ángel Gari en el Colegio Mayor Cerbuna de Zaragoza año 1964. Cedida Ángel preserva aparentemente la energía intelectual de un hombre joven aunque hace ya mucho que dejó de serlo. 81 años cumplió el pasado 7 de mayo. Una voz de mujer le susurra mientras...

title: 3万艘渔船出海 广东海事部门全力护航南海开渔
creator: chinanews
content: 中新网 广州8月17日电 (郭军 黄鸣鹤)8月16日12时,南海伏季休渔期结束,广东沿海迎来开渔日。当天,3万艘渔船从湛江、广州、茂名、阳江等沿海渔港集中出海,开启新一轮捕捞作业。 为保障开渔期间水上交通安全畅通,广东海事局联合广西、深圳海事局开展“2025护航开渔行动”,投入73艘海巡船艇、21架航空器及268名执法人员,在珠江口、琼州海峡、北部湾等重点水域开展海空立体巡航。 此次行动覆盖南海北部渔场、商渔船碰撞高风险区、渔船集中出港海区等关键水域。其中,珠江口水域担杆水道、琼州海峡、南澳岛附近及广东汕头海门、阳江闸坡,广西北海合浦等重点渔港周边,成为首日护航核心区域。 行动中,全国首艘万吨级海事巡逻船“海巡09”作为指挥船,通过VTS(船舶交通管理系统)实时监控渔船出港动态,引导商船避开渔船密集区。海事直升机从珠海金湾机场起飞,无人机同步升空,与海巡船艇形成“海空一体”监管网,重点巡查船舶航行秩序、锚泊规范,及时清理碍航渔具。 针对开渔首日渔船集中出港特点,广东海事部门联合渔政等单位实施交通组织,引导渔船有序离港,同步提醒商船加强瞭望、谨慎驾驶,通过VHF高频广播、智慧海事系统,累计向过往船舶发送安全提醒信息超千条。 此外,开渔当日,广东惠州、阳江、广州、汕尾等沿海地区也纷纷在相关海域开展护航开渔行动。 在惠州,有效防范商渔船碰撞事故,惠州海事局联合深圳大亚湾海事局、惠州市海洋综合执法支队、深圳市海洋综合执法支队大鹏大队、惠州市公安局大亚湾区分局、惠州大亚湾开发区管委会社会事务管理局等单位于开渔首日开展惠深“商渔共治”护航开渔联合执法行动。 据了解,8月16日至22日,海事部门将持续在西部陆海新通道航路、环海南岛沿海航路等重点水域开展集中巡航。 广东海事部门相关负责人表示,通过跨区域协同、科技赋能与立体监管,全力保障开渔季海上交通安全、畅通、有序,为渔民丰收筑牢安全屏障。 为确保水上交通安全,琼州海峡客滚运输将于8月16日19时至8月17日5时临时停运,停运持续10小时。(完)

title: Cardinals vs. Broncos live updates, score: Highlights, predictions for preseason Game 2
creator: Cardinals Wire
content: The Arizona Cardinals continue their preseason Saturday night against the Denver Broncos. They kick off at 9:30 p.m. ET (6:30 p.m. Arizona time) from Empower Field at Mile High in Denver. The game airs locally in Arizona on Arizona's Family CBS 5, and it will air live on NFL Network outside of the two teams' local viewing area. Neither team will play their starters, as they got in plenty of work in their joint practice on Thursday. There are plenty of roster and position battles to follow, though, so it is worth watching. Below is live coverage of the game after it begins, with scoring updates, news, highlights, injuries and more. Get more Cardinals and NFL coverage from Cards Wire's Jess Root and others by listening to the latest on the Rise Up, See Red podcast. title: 김종혁 "가짜뉴스 피해 심각...발뺌·책임 회피 집단 늘어날 것"
creator: 최송희
content: 김종혁 국민의힘 고양시병 당협위원장이 최근 사회적 논란을 불러온 가짜뉴스 사태와 관련해 "결국 속은 사람만 바보 되는 꼴"이라며 강하게 비판했다. 김 위원장은 16일 페이스북을 통해 "모 매체가 중국 간첩 체포, 부정선거 의혹 등 허위 보도를 시리즈로 내보냈다가 최근 사죄문을 게재했다"며 "해당 보도를 믿고 거리로 나와 시위를 벌이고, 관저 앞으로 몰려가거나 법원에 난입했다가 인생이 송두리째 바뀐 사람들이 어디 한둘이냐"고 지적했다. 그는 이어 "이런 엉터리 신문을 붙들고 울고불고하던 이들의 모습이 떠오른다"며 "정작 책임을 져야 할 쪽은 ‘폭력을 직접 선동하지 않았다’는 식으로 발뺌하고 있다"고 꼬집었다. 김 위원장은 또 "앞으로도 모 매체처럼 손을 씻으려는 집단과 사람들이 속출할 것"이라며 "최근 일부 보수 유튜브 채널조차 ‘서부지법 난입 사태의 배후가 대통령실’이라고 주장하는 등 혼란이 이어지고 있다"고 말했다. 그러면서 "아직도 망상에 사로잡혀 있다면 하루빨리 벗어나야 한다"고 강조했다.

title: Akie Iwai of Japan shoots 64 in Portland to take lead in bid for first LPGA Tour title
creator: Associated Press
content: PORTLAND, Ore. – Akie Iwai of Japan eagled the fifth hole and birdied the other three par 5s at Columbia Edgewater, shooting an 8-under 64 on Saturday to take a two-stroke lead in The Standard Portland Classic. Iwai is trying to join twin sister Chisato as an LPGA Tour winner this year after second-place finishes in Thailand in February and Los Angeles in April. Recommended Videos She put on a ball-striking exhibition Saturday in mostly calm conditions on the tree-lined course, hitting to 3 feet to set up the eagle and twice to a foot for birdie — the last on the par-4 18th to get to 18-under 198. “My style, my golf style, is aggressive,” she said. “That’s why no change this week. Also, aim to the pin — boom! boom! Every shot, every hole. That’s it.” Grace Kim of Australia was second after a 67. She holed a 156-yard shot for eagle from the left rough on the par-4 17th. “I was trying to see if I could get a drop,” Kim said. “I wasn’t entirely over the sprinkler-head boxes so you knew I just had to hit it. Leaked right again. I was like, `Oh, please get through the rough.' Somehow went in the hole, so I guess a little bit of luck in there.” Linn Grant was 14 under after a 65. The Swede won the 2023 Dana Open for her lone LPGA Tour title. “Tried to go out and just be, I wouldn’t say happy, but just accepting of whatever today would bring,” Grant said. “I think I played very mature and just had a lot of fun.” Gurleen Kaur had a 70 to get to 13 under, and Aditi Ashok (65) was...

title: Komatireddy keeps officials on their toes amid heavy rains
creator: The Hans India
content: Hyderabad: In view of the incessant rains and flood situation across Telangana, Roads and Buildings (R&B) Minister Komatireddy Venkat Reddy has directed officials of the department to remain on high alert and ensure public safety.Reviewing the situation with senior officials on Saturday, the Minister said that flood damage has been reported at 454 locations, including 629 km of roads under the R&B network. So far, 22 stretches have been washed away, of which four have already been temporarily restored to facilitate traffic. Venkat Reddy directed officials of the department to remain on high alert and ensure public safety. Out of 108 critical locations where connectivity was disrupted, 71 have been cleared on a war-footing, while works are underway at the remaining points. The Minister instructed engineers to conduct field inspections at culverts, causeways, and bridges and take all necessary precautions to prevent any loss of life. He asked officials to coordinate with the Police, Irrigation, Revenue, Panchayat Raj and Electricity departments to tackle the situation effectively. “Temporary restoration must be carried out immediately wherever roads and culverts have been cut off, so that public transport is not affected,” he said. Proposals for permanent reconstruction of damaged roads and bridges have also been sought. The Minister made it clear that all senior officials should remain at district headquarters and provide him with real-time updates on the ground situation. He...

title: ¿Se va? Chivas cae ante Juárez y exigen la SALIDA de Gabriel Milito

title: Shedeur Sanders rocked a $30 Nike bucket hat at Cleveland Browns preseason game
creator: The Sporting News
content: Shedeur Sanders rocked a $30 Nike bucket hat at Cleveland Browns preseason game originally appeared on The Sporting News Sure, Shedeur Sanders being injured for the Cleveland Browns' preseason matchup against the Philadelphia Eagles was disappointing after his incredible debut, but he still pulled up to the arena to support his teammates. For the occasion, Sanders arrived wearing the Nike Apex Swoosh Bucket Hat , which retails for $30 and comes in four different colors. Described the brand as the hat you "never knew you needed until now," it's made from soft woven twill and features an embroidered, color contrast Swoosh logo on the front panel. The design also includes a wraparound brim for 360-degree coverage and boasts a waterproof design. As for the rest of his outfit, Sanders wore a black hoodie and brown cargo shorts, which he paired with classic Deion Sanders sneakers in a black and white design. The 23-year-old athlete is frequently known for rocking fresh looks. At the Cleveland Browns' minicamp in May, he was seen carrying the $5,900 Getaway Weekender bag from Bottega Veneta , which is made with soft Intrecciato leather and comes with an adjustable and detachable strap and signature knot detailing. MORE: Sportico's 2025 NFL Valuation Report is in, and the Dallas Cowboys are the most valuable sports franchise And during the NFL Draft fiasco in late April, when he strangely wasn't drafted until the fifth round, he was seen wearing the popular Louis Vuitton monogram...

title: Shubhanshu Shukla returns to India; likely to meet PM Modi
Trump Gives Putin 'Peace Letter' From Wife Melania
creator: AFP News
content: US President Donald Trump handed Vladimir Putin a special item at their Alaska summit: a letter written by his wife, First Lady Melania Trump, pleading for the Russian leader to make peace in the name of children. The first lady's office on Saturday reposted a Fox News article on X containing the short letter, a day after Trump and Putin failed to find a breakthrough at their high-stakes meeting. Putin read the "peace letter" immediately after Trump handed it to him, while delegations from both sides looked on, according to Fox News. "In today's world, some children are forced to carry a quiet laughter, untouched by the darkness around them," read the letter, which was signed by the first lady and did not mention Ukraine by name. "Mr Putin, you can singlehandedly restore their melodic laughter," it added. "In protecting the innocence of these children, you will do more than serve Russia alone -- you serve humanity itself." "Such a bold idea transcends all human division, and you, Mr Putin, are fit to implement this vision with a stroke of the pen today," the letter read. "It is time." In July, the US president had said that his wife, who was born in Slovenia, had helped change his thinking about Putin. "I go home, I tell the first lady, 'you know, I spoke to Vladimir today, we had a wonderful conversation,'" Trump said. "And she said, 'Oh really? Another city was just hit.'" Trump attempted a rapprochement with Putin shortly after starting his second term, having campaigned...

title: "التقسم مستحيل".. الشرع يؤكد على وحدة أراضي سوريا
creator: سكاي نيوز عربية - أبوظبي
content: وقال الشرع في جلسة حواريه بحضور عدد من الوزراء، مع أكاديميين وسياسيين وأعضاء من النقابات المهنية والوجهاء في محافظة إدلب: "من يطالب بالتقسيم في سوريا عنده جهل سياسي، وحالم، كثير من الأحيان الأفكار الحالمة تؤدي بأصحابها إلى الانتحار". وأضاف: "لا أرى أن سوريا فيها مخاطر تقسيم، فيها رغبات عند بعض الناس لعملية تقسيم سوريا ، محاولة إنشاء كانتونات محلية وداخلية، لكن منطقيًا وسياسيًا وعرقيًا وعلقيًا هذا الأمر مستحيل أن يحدث". وحذر الشرع من "التنافس السلبي والنهم خلف المناصب والتقاسم السياسي والبحث عن الأدوار"، مؤكداً أن ذلك يؤثر على بنية المجتمع خاصة ونحن في مرحلة بناء الدولة والتي لها ظروف مختلفة"، حسب قوله. ولفت إلى أن "استقواء بعض الأطراف بقوى إقليمية، مثل إسرائيل، شىء كتير صعب، المنطقة الجنوبية ذات كثافة بشرية وأي عدو يريد الدخول إليها سيضطر أن يضع شرطيًا على باب كل بيت، وهذا الشىء صعب في واقع الحال". وبشأن الأحداث التي شهدتها محافظة السويداء مؤخرا، شدد الشرع على أن الدولة ملتزمة بمحاسبة مرتكبي التجاوزات في السويداء.

title: 蘇杭街住宅疑遭爆竊 32歲男逃走警揮棍制服 涉6罪被捕
creator: 香港01
content: 警昨(16日)凌晨約12時30分接獲一名40歲女住戶報案,指其位於中區蘇杭街3至5號的住宅單位懷疑遭爆竊。警員接報到場,於蘇杭街發現一名懷疑與案有關的男子,遂上前截查,惟其未有按指示停下,並嘗試逃走,人員其後以警棍制服該名男子。 警員在該名男子身上檢獲一把長約30厘米的刀、14.6克懷疑「冰」毒、2支含有懷疑大麻的手捲煙、3粒懷疑含有依托咪酯的煙彈及懷疑俗稱「偉哥」的第I部毒藥。檢獲的毒品總市值約8700元。 該名32歲姓梁本地男子涉嫌「爆竊」、「管有攻擊性武器」、「管有危險藥物」、「阻礙公職人員執行職務」、「管有第I部毒藥」及「未能出示身份證明文件」,現正被扣留調查。案件中沒有財物損失,交由中區刑事調查隊第2隊跟進。

title: Being a foreigner doesn’t put you above the law — Saifuddin Nasution says visas won’t grant rule-breakers immunity
content: KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 17 — The visa status held by foreigners does not grant them immunity to break the law in this country.Home Minister Datuk Seri Saifuddin Nasution Ismail said firm and stringent action will be taken against any foreign national who violates Malaysia’s laws, including breaching pass conditions, posing a security threat, or disturbing public order.He said actions taken include pass cancellation, blacklisting, and deportation to the country of origin, and this principle is applied consistently, irrespective of the individual’s background or status.“Visa status, whether as a student, investor, long-term visit pass holder, or participant in the Malaysia My Second Home (MM2H) programme, does not provide immunity from the laws of this country.“The safety of Malaysians and the sovereignty of the nation are non-negotiable priorities,” he said in a statement last night.Saifuddin said the Royal Malaysia Police (PDRM) consistently carries out its enforcement duties in a professional manner, without discrimination or exceptions based on race or country of origin, particularly in cases involving foreigners.He added that the law investigates all reports involving foreign nationals and takes appropriate action to ensure public safety, including in cases that receive media coverage.“Recent incidents involving foreigners that have gone viral have drawn public attention, but it must be emphasised that each case will be handled properly through existing laws,” he said.He...

title: Spencer Tunick, el fotógrafo que busca voluntarios para crear un gran desnudo en Granada: "Voy a retratar el espíritu español"
creator: Juan Salinas
content: En medio de un olivar de Granada , cientos o incluso miles de cuerpos desnudos de personas voluntarias se fundirán en septiembre con las formas orgánicas de los árboles centenarios. Será una imagen irrepetible, cargada de simbolismo y provocación estética. Esta será la nueva instalación del prestigioso fotógrafo neoyorquino Spencer Tunick (Middletown, Nueva York, 1967), quien elige las tierras granadinas como sede de su nuevo proyecto. Se trata de Retrato Alhambra 1925 , que cuenta con la colaboración de Cervezas Alhambra , lo que supone su primera intervención del artista en el sur de España. Famoso por sus fotografías donde retrata a multitudes de voluntarios desnudos, el fotógrafo , a lo largo de tres décadas de carrera, ha logrado conjugar la naturaleza del cuerpo humano y el espacio que lo habita, convirtiendo así la piel en un vehículo de arte y política y en un acto de belleza colectiva que rompe con cualquier tipo de tabú. Desnudo colectivo de Spencer Tunick en el zócalo de Ciudad de México, en 2007. Spencer Tunick Cedida Spencer Tunick ha llevado su arte por todo el mundo: Buenos Aires , Munich , Viena , Barcelona , Newcastle , Caracas , Montreal , Bogotá o São Paulo han sido sede de sus fotografías. Desde sus primeros trabajos en Nueva York en 1992, cuando fotografiaba cuerpos desnudos en las calles de Manhattan sin permisos oficiales –y por lo cual fue arrestado varias veces–, ha pasado a convertirse en un artista de renombre global, autor...

title: 水族館で6歳男児の腕に巻きついたのは...“巨大ダコ”。母親がアザの写真を公開
creator: Jasmine Oliphant
content: 米テキサス州サン・アントニオ水族館を訪れた6歳の男児がタコの水槽に手を入れたあと、腕に数十カ所のあざを負った。 男児の母親がTikTokでことの詳細を明かし、注目を集めている。 My son has visited the same octopus every week for 3 years. She always loved him until today, when she tried to pull him into the tank. It took 3 aquarium employees to get her off. Was it affection? Recognition? Or something more dangerous? We thought it was a sweet animal bond... until it left bruises. And when we walked back later, she changed color the second she saw him. 🎥 Watch til the end. 💬 Tell me: Was this love or a warning sign? 🧠 Octopus experts, weigh in. #Octopus #AquariumStory #AnimalBondGoneWrong #OctopusBehavior #SeaLife #AnimalInstinct #MarineBiology #ParentingTikTok 動画を投稿したのは、ブリトニー・タリンさん。 タリンさんによると、親子は2021年ごろから頻繁にサン・アントニオ水族館を訪れていたという。動画内でタリンさんは、水族館の名前は伏せている。 水族館はタコの飼育を始めた3年前から、来館者がタコに触れることを許可しており、「今までは問題がなかった」とタリンさんは主張する。 息子の夏休み中に、久しぶりに友人たちと水族館を訪れると、タコは巨大に成長していたという。 その成長ぶりに驚いたタリンさんは、スタッフに「これは同じタコですか」と尋ね、「そうです」と返答があったと、振り返る。 タリンさんが撮影したタコ タリンさんいわく、ほかの来館者がタコに触れていたのを見て、息子にも触らせた。 いつもは動物に対して落ち着いて接する息子が「タコが離してくれない」と訴えたため、タリンさんは息子を抱き上げたが、それでもタコは離れなかったという。 水槽タンクから出てこようとする巨大タコに、タリンさんと友人はパニックになった。 タコを傷つけないように離そうとしたものの、息子の腕にアザができていることに気づき、周りに助けを求めたという。 周囲に飼育員はおらず、しばらくすると、男性スタッフが「今日はタコが遊びたい気分なんだね」と言いながら、焦る様子もなく助けに来たという。それでもタコは離れようとせず、さらに2人のスタッフが駆けつけた。 最終的には飼育員が3人がかりで引き離したという。全員が落ち着いて対処したというが、息子の腕には数十箇所のアザが残った。 タリンさんは動画内で、ケガの写真も公開している。一方で、息子が今回の出来事を前向きに受け止め、「とてもクールな出来事だった」と話していると明かした。...

title: 筑牢经济底盘 夯实发展支撑 ——看中国经济之“重”
creator: chinanews
content: 大国经济,有其“大”,亦有其“重”。 2024年粮食总产量迈上1.4万亿斤新台阶;今年上半年进出口规模站稳20万亿元台阶,创历史同期新高;“十四五”规划的102项重大工程,预计年底前全部完成规划目标......沉甸甸的数字,一头连着国计、一头连着民生,一头连着发展、一头连着安全,关乎我国的生存力、竞争力、发展力、持续力,关乎中国式现代化进程。 习近平总书记强调:“我国经济基础稳、优势多、韧性强、潜力大,支撑高质量发展的积极因素在不断积累。” 7月30日召开的中共中央政治局会议指出:“要保持战略定力,增强必胜信心,积极识变应变求变,集中力量办好自己的事,在激烈国际竞争中赢得战略主动”。 下半年是完成全年目标任务的关键期。夯实“三农”基础,扩大高水平对外开放,推进“两重”建设......桩桩件件,都是“国之大者”。坚定不移办好自己的事,确保“干一件、成一件”。 从“三农”看基础稳底盘厚 中共中央政治局会议指出:“夯实‘三农’基础,推动粮食和重要农产品价格保持在合理水平。巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果,确保不发生规模性返贫致贫。” 看中国经济之“重”,“三农”是一个非常重要的视角。 “我反复强调要办好自己的事,其中很重要的一个任务就是始终立足自身抓好农业生产,以国内稳产保供的确定性来应对外部环境的不确定性。”习近平总书记指出。 面对风险挑战,中国经济能够保持稳健增长韧性,“三农”这个“压舱石”功不可没。 底盘厚重,抗冲击更有底气。 鄱阳湖平原,粮食生产压茬推进。 “抢收的早籼稻亩产超过1000斤,抢种的晚稻已经分蘖了。”江西省贵溪市泗沥镇新塘村农户朱永水说。 新塘村党支部书记杨育亮说:“订单收购,平均一亩地能多收入100多元。效益好,大伙种粮积极性都高了。” 今年,我国夏粮生产克服局部地区较重旱情影响,产量达到2994.8亿斤,全国夏粮实现稳产丰收。 “十四五”时期,我国粮食生产连年丰收。目前,谷物、肉类、花生、蔬菜、茶叶、水果等产量均居世界首位。 “‘米袋子’‘菜篮子’稳得住,为中国经济破浪前行守住了‘战略后院’。”中国农业风险管理研究会会长张红宇说。 底盘厚重,催生更强发展势能。 新塘村帮扶车间里加工正忙。车间进村,就近就业,务工村民人均年增收近万元,村集体经济也不断壮大。 “今年村集体经济收入估计能突破50万元,除了给村民分红,还准备维护一下农田基础设施、购置些农机设备。”杨育亮说。 增收的喜悦不只在新塘村。今年上半年,我国农村居民人均可支配收入11936元,扣除价格因素,比上年同期实际增长6.2%。 城乡发展不平衡是我国发展最大的不平衡,但也蕴含着强大的发展势能,是大有可为的舞台。畅通工农城乡循环,对于增强我国经济韧性具有重要意义,拓展了中国式现代化的战略纵深。 城乡收入差距持续缩小,激发了内循环的强劲动力。上半年,我国乡村消费品零售额32409亿元,同比增长4.9%,包括镇区和乡村的县乡市场规模占社会消费品零售总额的比重较上年同期提高0.1个百分点。 城乡融合加速推进,以人为本的新型城镇化驱动经济增长更有韧性。据测算,我国城镇化率提高1个百分点,每年可新增2000多亿元的消费需求,拉动万亿元规模新增投资需求。 “当前,我们的制度优势更加巩固、物质基础更加雄厚、发展基础更加坚实。着眼下半年以及‘十五五’时期,亟须从‘有没有’到‘好不好’的转变中,把握‘三农’领域发展新机遇,为应对各种风险挑战赢得更大主动权,提供更强确定性。”张红宇表示。 从外贸看韧性强活力足 中共中央政治局会议指出:“要扩大高水平对外开放,稳住外贸外资基本盘。”...

title: ФОТО. Перед Вересом: Лукас Феррейра провел первую тренировку в Шахтере
creator: Даниил Агарков
content: 16 августа донецкий Шахтер официально объявил о подписании 19-летнего бразильского вингера Лукаса Феррейры из Сан-Паулу, Бразилия. В субботу бразилец вместе с командой провел свою первую тренировку в футболке горняков. Все самые яркие моменты матча доступны в режиме LIVE в Telegram Sport.ua 17 числа подопечные Аррды Турана сыграет с Вересом из города Ровно в матче третьего тура УПЛ 2025/26. Шахтер за первые два поединка нового сезона чемпионата Украины набрал четыре очка: победа над Эпицентром (1:0) и ничья с Карпатами (3:3). ФОТО. title: El sello de la Misericordia: Residencia Familiar de Caritas
creator: Redacción El Rancagüino
content: “Crear un ambiente familiar, con un enfoque en el buen trato, el respeto y la convivencia protectora” es una de las misiones de la residencia familiar Nuestra Señora de la Misericordia, a cargo de Fundación Caritas y Acción Social de la diócesis, que en estos momentos alberga a cuatro familias necesitadas.La residencia está ubicada en un barrio antiguo de la ciudad de Rancagua, en calle Bueras 0377, y detrás de sus puertas hay un sistema que funciona más allá de los requerimientos estrictamente técnicos del programa financiado con fondos del Ministerio de Desarrollo Social. Aquí, los grupos familiares que ingresan encuentran algo más que alojamiento y comida, encuentran la acogida cristiana.La encargada de la residencia Paola Parada, Terapeuta Ocupacional, explica que Fundación Caritas ha marcado un sello distinto, pues si bien el objetivo es apoyar a las familias para que salgan de su situación, no se hace a través del asistencialismo sino de la entrega de herramientas para volver al sistema laboral.A los residentes se les ofrece contención, se realizan gestiones con otras redes de apoyo de acuerdo con sus necesidades y también se busca que tengan sentido de pertenencia, lo que se logra a través del cuidado del espacio común, donde cada familia cumple un rol.Cada grupo familiar puede permanecer en la residencia durante dos meses. Durante este tiempo pueden ahorrar para tener un lugar donde vivir después de este periodo. Un convenio con un colegio cercano...

title: Эксперт рассказал, как получать до 6 тысяч вычета за детей
creator: Алексей Козырин
content: Эксперт РАНХиГС Марина Солодовникова рассказала, как в России по закону можно получить налоговые вычеты за детей. «К стандартным вычетам также относятся вычеты на детей до 18 лет или до 23 лет для студентов дневной формы обучения. Размер вычета зависит от количества детей: на первого ребенка он составляет 1,4 тысячи рублей в месяц, на второго — 2,8 тысячи рублей, на третьего — 3 тысячи рублей. Максимальная сумма вычета — 6 тысяч рублей», — объяснила она РИА Новости. Налоговый вычет предоставляется до получения родителями с начала года дохода в 450 тысяч рублей. Как только выплаты превышают эту сумму, начисление налогового вычета прекращается. Ранее «СП» сообщала о том, что россиянам рассказали о нововведениях в плане наследства умерших родственников. В Кемерове суд подтвердил приговор экс-огнеборцу по обвинению в смерти 23 бездомных Житель Камчатки устроил гараж на первом этаже многоквартирного дома Юрист заявил о новшествах в наследстве умерших Варламов заочно приговорен к 8 годам колонии и штрафу 99 млн рублей

title: Rookie QB Jaxson Dart continues to impress for Giants, while Jets' Justin Fields struggles
creator: Yahoo Sports
content: The annual New York Jets vs. New York Giants preseason game always has a little more juice than almost every other game in August. This year's meeting was notable because of the quarterback storylines. On the Giants' side, Russell Wilson takes over as the starter but it seems inevitable that first-round pick Jaxson Dart will take over the starting job at some point this season. There has even been some thought that maybe Dart could make a push for the job in Week 1 if he has a great preseason, after playing very well at Buffalo last week. For the Jets, Aaron Rodgers is gone and Justin Fields replaces him. That means a much different offense for the Jets, considering Fields is far more effective as a runner than a passer. [ Join or create a Yahoo Fantasy Football league for the 2025 NFL season ] Here's what we learned Saturday night: Wilson can still throw a nice deep ball, Dart played very well again and there will be continued buzz about him taking over as the starter. And Fields will go into the season with plenty of questions about his ability as a passer. Wilson's deep passing is probably still his biggest strength, and he showed that on his first drive Saturday. He hit undrafted rookie Beaux Collins down the middle of the field for an 80-yard gain. Devin Singletary finished the drive with a 1-yard touchdown run. Dart oddly came in for one pass during a series in the second quarter, and he produced a highlight. Dart improvised and had a fun sidearm throw to Theo Johnson,...

title: 尹 사저에 남겨진 반려동물 11마리...김여사 측근들이 돌보기로
creator: 최원정
content: 윤석열 전 대통령에 이어 김건희 여사가 구속되며 남겨진 반려동물들은 어떻게 될까. 17일 연합뉴스 취재를 종합하면 주인을 잃은 반려동물들은 서초동 사저에 머물고 있으며, 코바나콘텐츠와 대통령실에서 김 여사를 보좌해온 측근들이 사저를 오가며 돌보기로 한 것으로 전해졌다. 자녀가 없는 윤 전 대통령 부부는 관저에서 강아지 6마리와 고양이 5마리를 길렀으며, 파면 이후 모두 사저로 데려갔다. 윤 전 대통령은 1월 체포되기 직전에도 "토리를 보고 가야겠다"며 10여분 동안 강아지와 시간을 보내는 등 애착이 큰 것으로 유명하다. 법원의 구속 취소로 잠시 풀려났던 지난 5월에는 반려견을 데리고 산책하는 모습이 포착되기도 했다. 전직 대통령 부부가 모두 구속되는 초유의 상황에 대통령경호처는 부부의 반려동물들을 어떻게 관리해야 할지 고심해온 것으로 알려졌다. 윤 전 대통령 부부는 구속 여부와 관계없이 2035년 4월까지 경호처의 경호 대상이다. 현행 대통령경호법 제2조 제1항은 '경호'를 '경호 대상자의 생명과 재산을 보호하기 위해 신체에 가해지는 위해를 방지하거나 제거하는 활동'으로 규정한다. 반려동물 또한 법적으로 재산이기에 일각에선 경호처의 관리 의무가 있다는 해석과, 국민 정서상 맞지 않다는 우려가 엇갈렸던 것으로 알려졌다. 김 여사의 측근들이 돌보기로 하며 논란은 해소됐으나, 이들 상당수가 특별검사팀의 수사선상에 올라 있는 점은 변수로 남아있다. 윤 전 대통령 부부가 떠난 서초동 사저 아크로비스타에...

title: ಇಂದು ಗಗನಯಾತ್ರಿ ಶುಭಾಂಶು ಭಾರತಕ್ಕೆ
creator: Kannadaprabha News
content: ನವದೆಹಲಿ/ಲಖನೌ : ಆಕ್ಸಿಯೋಂ-4 ಮಿಷನ್ ಭಾಗವಾಗಿ ಅಂತಾರಾಷ್ಟ್ರೀಯ ಬಾಹ್ಯಾಕಾಶ ನಿಲ್ದಾಣಕ್ಕೆ (ಐಎಸ್ಎಸ್) ತೆರಳಿ ಐತಿಹಾಸಿಕ ಅಂತರಿಕ್ಷ ಯಾನ ಮುಗಿಸಿ ಭೂಮಿಗೆ ಹಿಂದಿರುಗಿರುವ ಗಗನಯಾತ್ರಿ ಶುಭಾಂಶು ಶುಕ್ಲಾ, ಕಾರ್ಯಾಚರಣೆ ಮುಗಿದ ಬಳಿಕ ಇದೇ ಮೊದಲ ಬಾರಿಗೆ ತಾಯ್ನಾಡು ಭಾರತಕ್ಕೆ ಭೇಟಿ ನೀಡಲಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಭಾನುವಾರ ದೆಹಲಿಗೆ ಬರಲಿರುವ ಅವರು ಪ್ರಧಾನಿ ನರೇಂದ್ರ ಮೋದಿಯವರನ್ನು ಭೇಟಿಯಾಗಿ ಮಾತುಕತೆ ನಡೆಸಲಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಆ ಬಳಿಕ ತಮ್ಮ ಹುಟ್ಟೂರು ಉತ್ತರ ಪ್ರದೇಶದ ಲಖನೌಗೆ ತೆರಳಲಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಲಖನೌ ನಿವಾಸಿಗಳು ಅವರ ಬರುವಿಕೆಗೆ ಕಾದಿದ್ದು, ‘ಭವ್ಯ ವಿಜಯ ಮೆರವಣಿಗೆ’ ಹಮ್ಮಿಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಆ.22-23ರಂದು ದೆಹಲಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆಯಲಿರುವ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರೀಯ ಬಾಹ್ಯಾಕಾಶ ದಿನದ ಆಚರಣೆಯಲ್ಲಿಯೂ ಪಾಲ್ಗೊಳ್ಳಲಿದ್ದಾರೆ ಎನ್ನಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಭಾರತಕ್ಕೆ ವಿಮಾನ ಹತ್ತಿ ಅದರ ಫೋಟೋ ಜತೆಗೆ ಇನ್‌ಸ್ಟಾಗ್ರಾಂನಲ್ಲಿ ಪೋಸ್ಟ್ ಮಾಡಿರುವ ಅವರು, ‘ಭಾರತಕ್ಕೆ ಮರಳಲು ವಿಮಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ಕುಳಿತಾಗ ನನ್ನ ಹೃದಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಭಾವ ಉಂಟಾಗುತ್ತಿದೆ. ಕಳೆದ ಒಂದು ವರ್ಷದಿಂದ ನನ್ನ ಬೆನ್ನಿಗೆ ನಿಂತ ಅದ್ಭುತ ಗೆಳೆಯರನ್ನು ಬಿಟ್ಟು ಬರುತ್ತಿದ್ದೇನೆ. ಆದರೆ ಕಾರ್ಯಾಚರಣೆ ಬಳಿಕ ಇದೇ ಮೊದಲ ಬಾರಿಗೆ ಭಾರತದಲ್ಲಿರುವ ನನ್ನೆಲ್ಲ ಸ್ನೇಹಿತರು, ಕುಟುಂಬವನ್ನು ಭೇಟಿ ಮಾಡಲು ಉತ್ಸುಕನೂ ಆಗಿದ್ದೇನೆ. ಎಲ್ಲವೂ ಒಂದೇ ಬಾರಿಗೆ- ಜೀವನ ಎಂದರೆ ಇದೇ ಎನಿಸುತ್ತದೆ’ ಎಂದು ಬರೆದುಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಈ ಹಿಂದೆ ರಷ್ಯಾ ಗಗನಯಾನಿ ಯೂರಿ ಗಗರಿನ್‌ 1961ರಲ್ಲಿ ಭಾರತಕ್ಕೆ ಬಂದಾಗ ಅವರಿಗಾಗಿ ಅಂದಿನ ಪ್ರಧಾನಿ ಜವಾಹರಲಾಲ್‌ ನೆಹರು ಮೆರವಣಿಗೆ ಏರ್ಪಡಿಸಿದ್ದರು. 1984ರಲ್ಲಿ ಇಂದಿರಾ ಗಾಂಧಿ ಪ್ರಧಾನಿ ಆಗಿದ್ದಾಗ ರಾಕೇಶ್‌ ಶರ್ಮಾ ಗಗನಯಾನದಿಂದ ಭಾರತಕ್ಕೆ ಮರಳಿದಾಗ ಮೆರವಣಿಗೆ ನಡೆದಿತ್ತು,

title: "수강 신청하듯 예약" 10분 만에 매진...이틀 동안 1만명 몰렸다
creator: 박수빈
content: "1분 남았습니다", "여기도 봐주세요!" 이달 초 경기 고양 일산 킨텍스에서 열린 세계 최대 피규어·조형 아트 축제 '원더페스티벌 2025' 현장. 게임 '승리의 여신: 니케(니케)' 속 메이드를 코스프레한 여성 코스어(코스프레 하는 사람)를 향해 40여명이 사진을 촬영하고 있었다. 코스어는 5분간 방향을 바꿔가며 포즈를 취했다. 촬영 시간이 끝난 후 코스어가 메이드 카페로 돌아가자 모여 있던 관람객들은 일제히 흩어졌다. 이 같은 원더페스티벌의 '니케 메이드 카페'는 10분 만에 사전 예약이 매진됐다. 한 타임당 50명이 입장해 이틀간 총 500명이 해당 부스를 찾았다. 사전 예약에 성공한 김혜성 씨(30)는 "경쟁이 치열하다고 해서 수강 신청하듯 예약했다. 예약에 성공했을 때 다행이라는 생각이 들었다"고 말했다. 원더페스티벌에서는 피규어, 프라모델뿐만 아니라 버추얼 아이돌 무대, 코스프레 대회 등 서브컬처 지식재산권(IP)를 기반으로 한 다양한 콘텐츠를 즐길 수 있었다. 행사 기간 이틀 동안 총 1만1000명이 행사장을 방문했다. 행사장에는 20개월 된 딸을 안고 온 아빠도 있었다. 강원영 씨(42)는 자신을 프라모델과 피규어를 좋아하는 '키덜트'라고 소개했다. 강 씨는 "인터넷에서 아시아 최대 피규어 행사라고 해서 보고 왔다. 아무래도 일본이 오리지널인데 일본과 비교해서 어떤 물건이 있을까 기대하고 왔다"고 말했다. 원더페스티벌은 41년 된 세계 최대 피규어·조형 아트 행사다. 그동안 한국에선 개최된 적 없었는데 올해 처음 국내에 상륙했다....

title: LAFC 손흥민, MLS 첫 도움 기록한 듯했지만 '취소'
creator: 하근수 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 하근수 기자 = 로스앤젤레스FC(LAFC) 손흥민이 뉴잉글랜드 레볼루션을 상대로 미국 프로축구 메이저리그(MLS) 첫 도움을 기록하는 듯했지만 정정됐다. LAFC는 17일(한국 시간) 미국 매사추세츠주 폭스버러의 질레트 스타디움에서 열린 뉴잉글랜드와의 2025 MLS 정규리그 원정 경기 중 후반 6분 마르코 델가도의 선제골로 1-0 리드를 잡았다. 후반 6분 높은 위치에서 압박한 LAFC가 볼을 빼앗는 데 성공했다. 페널티 박스 안에 있던 손흥민이 매트 폴스터와 부딪혔고, 델가도가 흘러나온 볼을 슈팅해 골망을 갈랐다. 당초 MLS는 사무국 홈페이지를 통해 손흥민이 해당 득점을 어시스트했다고 전했으나, 볼이 손흥민이 아닌 폴스터의 발에 맞고 흐른 것으로 보고 도움 기록을 취소했다. 이날 손흥민은 왼쪽에 드니 부앙가, 오른쪽에 다비드 마르티네스와 함께 선발 출격해 공격진을 구성했다. 손흥민은 최전방 스트라이커로 동료들을 이끌며 뉴잉글랜드 골문을 두드리고 있다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

Dinero : Lograrás solucionar un verdadero problema en tu ambiente laboral durante el día de hoy. No temas mostrar de lo que eres capaz. Horóscopo de hoy : Demostrarás haber aprendido a lidiar con las negativas y los rechazos en lo que a las conquistas se refiere. No te desanimes. Amor : No dejes que un arranque de furia y frustración acaben con tanto tiempo dedicado a cultivar la relación con tu pareja. Dinero : Entrarás en un periodo de completa distracción, haciendo imposible que alcances tu ritmo laboral acostumbrado. title: White House Backs Off 'Hostile Takeover' of D.C. Police
creator: Time
content: WASHINGTON, DC - AUGUST 14: Members of the National Guard walk on the National Mall on August 14, 2025 in Washington, DC. President Donald Trump announced plans to deploy federal officers and the National Guard to the District in order to place the DC Metropolitan Police Department under federal control and assist in crime prevention in the nation's capital. Credit - Anna Moneymaker—Getty Images T he White House has backed off plans for a full takeover of the D.C. police force and will allow for the city’s police chief to remain in charge after a judge indicated they would block the move. President Donald Trump this week invoked emergency powers to take control of the D.C. police department and call in the National Guard to a city that he claimed is overrun by "bloodshed, bedlam and squalor"— a claim that is disputed by experts . Read More: Trump Paints a Picture of D.C. as a Crime-Ridden Hell-Hole. Here Are the Facts As part of the federal takeover, Attorney General Pam Bondi appointed Drug and Enforcement Administration (DEA) Administrator Terrance C. Cole as “ Emergency Police Commissioner ,” a move that would have given the White House extraordinary powers over policing. The city’s Attorney General Brian Schwalb filed a lawsuit calling for an emergency restraining order to block the move, accusing the Trump Administration of implementing a “hostile takeover” of the Metropolitan Police Department (MPD) that would lead to “imminent, irreparable harm”. “In my nearly three...

title: La desaparición de Pertur, el jefe que quiso dejar las armas y convertir ETA en un partido: una novela para resolver el caso
creator: Daniel Ramírez
content: A principios de los setenta, Manuel Iribarren , premio nacional de Literatura , publicó una novela titulada Las paredes ven . Ahí se daba al gran público un hilo argumental muy popular hoy en las series de Netflix: pasado el tiempo, los cadáveres emergen de la oscuridad y todo se sabe. Porque las paredes ven. No hay nada que podamos hacer verdaderamente en la clandestinidad. El caso de Pertur refuta esa teoría y, al fin, tiene una novela que, igual que la de Iribarren en su día, pone en manos de los lectores con telegráfica verosimilitud la posibilidad contraria: desaparecer para siempre sin dejar rastro. O mejor dicho: la posibilidad de hacer desaparecer a alguien sin dejar rastro. Se llama Manto de silencio , la firma Iñaki Martínez y la recomienda, entre otros muchos, Fernando Aramburu . Pertur se llamaba Eduardo Moreno Bergareche y era un hijo de la burguesía donostiarra. Fue al colegio con los marianistas y a la universidad (Empresariales) con los jesuitas. Siempre con los curas. Lo que justifica ese tocho de color amarillo y letras negras que está en tantas casas: ETA nació en un seminario . Pertur, por empezar por el final, era un etarra que defendía la violencia mientras Franco vivía, pero que quiso convertir la banda en partido político cuando Franco murió. En esas circunstancias, apenas un año después de muerto el dictador, Pertur desapareció. Dicho con un titular, fue el primer arrepentido que quiso arrebatar a ETA la Goma-2 y el revólver. Hay...

title: Siêu tiền đạo người Jamaica chưa thể nhập tịch Việt Nam
creator: Thethao247
content: Dù được kỳ vọng có thể sớm nhập tịch nhưng Rimario vẫn chỉ được đăng ký ở dạng ngoại binh mùa này. Hiện tại có một số cầu thủ đã đủ 5 năm hoặc hơn sinh sống và thi đấu tại Việt Nam bao gồm Gustavo Santos (Đà Nẵng), Rimario (Thanh Hoá), Hendrio (Hà Nội), Geovane (Ninh Bình), Janclesio (Ninh Bình). Trong số này rất nhiều cái tên đang được CLB hỗ trợ thủ tục nhập tịch Việt Nam, trong đó có Rimario của Thanh Hóa. Ngôi sao người Jamaica được cho đã nhận được sự hỗ trợ từ ban lãnh đạo CLB Đông Á Thanh Hóa trong việc hoàn tất các thủ tục pháp lý trước khi có quốc tịch Việt Nam. Trước đó vào đầu năm nay, Chủ tịch CLB Thanh Hóa, ông Cao Tiến Đoan cũng khẳng định sẽ hỗ trợ Rimario có quốc tịch Việt Nam sau khi tiền đạo này hồi phục chấn thương. Tuy nhiên CLB Thanh Hóa hiện tại đã nộp danh sách đăng ký thi đấu ở V-League 2025/2026 và Rimario vẫn được đăng ký dưới dạng ngoại binh. Đội bóng xứ Thanh đã chốt xong danh sách 4 ngoại binh của mình bao gồm Rimario, Ribamar và 2 tân binh mới bao gồm Abdurakhmanov Odilzhon và Mamadou Mbodj. Động thái này có thể hiểu được rằng Rimario chưa thể nhập quốc tịch Việt Nam trong thời gian tới. Nên nhớ mỗi cầu thủ chỉ được đăng ký 1 trạng thái trong suốt mùa giải. Tương tự như...

title: Электромобили уверенно завоевывают рынок
Moisés Caicedo EN VIVO: Debut en Premier League: horario, canal y cómo ver al Chelsea
creator: Jerson Ruiz
content: Moisés Caicedo inicia un nuevo capítulo en su carrera y lo hace en la liga más exigente del mundo. El domingo 17 de agosto, desde las 08:00 de Ecuador, e l Chelsea abrirá su camino en la Premier League 2025/2026 enfrentando al Crystal Palace en Stamford Bridge. El duelo marcará el esperado debut oficial del ecuatoriano en esta temporada, con transmisión por ESPN y cobertura minuto a minuto en extra.ec. Caicedo llega con un currículum brillante. Fue elegido mejor jugador del Chelsea la campaña pasada, levantó la Liga Conferencia y brilló en la final con un gol ante el Betis. Además, fue pieza clave en el Mundial de Clubes, donde los ‘Blues’ se consagraron campeones y Moi terminó siendo reconocido como el tercer mejor futbolista del torneo. Su figura creció tanto que en sus vacaciones en Ecuador no podía caminar tranquilo por las calles, entre fotos, saludos y muestras de cariño de la afición. “Quiero empezar la temporada muy bien. Sabemos de la dificultad de la Premier, pero estoy seguro de que vamos a hacerlo bien. Tengo hambre de más, no tengo límites y voy a trabajar duro para seguir logrando cosas con este club ”, dijo convencido el mediocampista. El 2025/2026 trae nuevos desafíos para el jugador de Santo Domingo, que debutará en la UEFA Champions League, una vitrina que siempre soñó disputar. “Cuando lo ves por televisión sabes que es diferente, todo el mundo está pendiente. Es otro nivel y queremos hacerlo bien”, confesó. Con solo 23 años,...

title: Tak Kenal Libur di Hari Kemerdekaan, 'Pasukan Oranye' Maknai Merdeka di Jalanan Ibu Kota
故 변중석 여사 18주기...정의선 회장 등 범현대가 한자리에
creator: 김승현 기자
content: [서울=뉴스핌] 김승현 기자 = 고(故) 정주영 현대그룹 명예회장의 부인인 고(故) 변중석 여사의 18주기를 맞아 범(汎)현대 일가가 한자리에 모였다. 17일 현대자동차그룹에 따르면 변 여사의 18주기 전날인 지난 16일 서울 종로구 청운동 정 명예회장 옛 자택에서 정의선 현대차그룹 회장 등 현대가 가족들이 모여 제사를 지냈다. 범현대가는 지난 3월 20일 정 명예회장의 24주기를 하루 앞두고 모여 제사를 지낸 바 있다. 18주기에는 정의선 회장과 정일선 현대비앤지스틸 사장, 정기선 HD현대 수석부회장, 정몽준 아산재단 이사장, 정몽일 현대미래로그룹 회장, 정몽혁 현대코퍼레이션그룹 회장, 현정은 현대그룹 회장, 정몽원 HL그룹 회장, 정몽윤 현대해상화재보험그룹 회장, 정몽규 HDC 회장, 정교선 현대백화점그룹 부회장, 정몽익 KCC글라스 회장, 정지선 현대백화점그룹 회장이 참석했다. 청운동 자택은 정 명예회장이 생전에 머물던 곳으로 지난 2019년 맏손자인 정의선 회장이 소유권을 물려받은 이후 2020년부터 제사를 지내고 있다. kimsh@newspim.com

title: Экс-полковник Британской армии: ВС России доказали, что они не «бумажный тигр»
creator: (Юлия Курганова)
content: РФ добилась успеха на поле боя и развила активное наступление на Украине, несмотря на многолетнее давление Запада. Об этом высказался отставной полковник Вооруженных сил Британии Ричард Кемп, комментируя итоги переговоров президентов Российской Федерации и Соединенных Штатов Владимира Путина и Дональда Трампа, которые прошли на Аляске 15 августа. — Россия показала, что ее армия не «бумажный тигр». Широко разрекламированное западное вооружение, технологическое превосходство и военные доктрины оказались недостаточными, чтобы победить ее, — заявил он изданию The Sunday Telegraph. РФ адаптировала свои силы и стратегии для использования беспилотников так, как не получилось у Запада, отметил Кемп. По его словам, Европа фактически стала сторонним наблюдателем в вопросе судьбы Украины и своей безопасности. Европейские страны должны взять на себя основную ответственность за поддержку Украины и инвестировать в ее будущее больше, чем США, добавил полковник, передает ТАСС . 16 августа заместитель председателя Совета безопасности РФ Дмитрий Медведев привел пять пунктов , которые назвал «первыми результатами» саммита на Аляске.

title: Takeaways and observations from the first half as Ravens hold an 18-7 lead over Cowboys
creator: Ravens Wire
content: Baltimore is in Dallas for an intriguing Saturday afternoon preseason contest, and Zach Orr's defense has shown that it can be an elite unit with backups in the game. Baltimore has 16 first downs compared to Dallas' two first downs, and the Ravens have amassed 273 yards compared to the Cowboys' 31 yards. With the second half underway, we're looking at takeaways and observations from the first half in Dallas.Rasheen Ali is legit.Looking to make the Ravens running back room a four-player situation, Ali had six carries for 28 yards to start the game in Dallas with Keaton Mitchell in street clothes. Overall, Ali had 14 carries for 39 yards (2.8 avg). Update: Ali would later drop a pass from Cooper Rush that turned into an interception for Kemon Hall. Ravens undrafted free agents are playmakers.Dayton Wade had four catches for 45 yards, while Keyon Martin had three tackles, one sack, one tackle for loss, and one QB hit. Devontez Walker WR No. 4If Devontez Walker can land the No. 4 spot, he could be in line for 25 catches, 550 yards, and four touchdowns.Walker had four catches in the first quarter for 57 yards and six catches for 61 yards on eight targets. Ravens' defense is solid. Zach Orr's revamped unit had allowed one first down and 14 total yards at one point in the first half. Dallas' first three drives ended in a safety, a punt, and a 4th-down stop. Cooper Rush bounces backAfter throwing a pick-six, Ravens quarterback Cooper Rush responded with a 1-yard TD to Keith Kirkwood...

title: Nashville apartment fire displaces entire complex; firefighters discuss possible dryer vent concerns
creator: Kim Rafferty
content: NASHVILLE, Tenn. (WTVF) — A fire at a Nashville apartment building has left all residents without homes after flames tore through a 12-unit building on Highway 70. Elvyn Agboto woke up to thick smoke filling his apartment. "I couldn't see like three feet ahead of me because there was so much smoke in the house," Agboto said. He searched for his mom and brother, but they had already left for work, so Agboto ran outside to safety. "The fire alarm didn't go off at first but after a while like after being out here for a minute or two that is when everything started going off," he said. Nashville firefighters responded to reports of an appliance fire at the complex. When they arrived, they faced challenging conditions. For the first thirty minutes, Nashville Fire's District 19 Chief Aaron Sparkman says they tried to save the building. He discussed potential maintenance concerns that could be related to the fire. "I don't know the cause of the fire but let's just say if it were the dryer vents and those dryer vents run throughout the entire structure," Sparkman said. He emphasized the importance of regular maintenance for fire prevention. "Get your lint pipes cleaned out on a quarterly or annually basis that could be fire prevention all by itself," Sparkman said. The fire displaced everyone living in the 12-unit building. While no residents were injured, the firefighters battled both flames and extreme heat. "We did have one transported with minor burns to his arm I believe some...

content: Happy New Year Wishes in Malayalam: അങ്ങനെ പൊന്നിൻ ചിങ്ങമെത്തി. മലയാളികളുടെ പൊന്നോണത്തിന്റെ ആവേശം ഇന്ന് തുടങ്ങുകയാണ്. പഞ്ഞക്കർക്കിടകത്തിൽ നിന്ന് പൊന്നിൻ ചിങ്ങപ്പുലരിയിലേക്ക്...പ്രതിസന്ധികളുടെ കാലത്തിൽ നിന്ന് സന്തോഷത്തിന്റെ നാളുകളിലേക്കുള്ള പ്രതീക്ഷയാണ് ഓരോ മലയാളിയ്ക്കും ചിങ്ങ മാസം. ഇന്ന് ചിങ്ങം 1, സമൃദ്ധിയുടെ പുതുവർഷം. കേരളത്തിന്റെ കാർഷിക ദിനവും. ഈ പുതുവർഷദിനത്തിൽ നിങ്ങളുടെ പ്രിയപ്പെട്ടവർക്കും കൂട്ടുകാർക്കും ആശംസ അറിയിക്കാൻ മറക്കണ്ട. അതും ക്ലീഷേ വിട്ട് മനോഹരമായ ആശംസകൾ പങ്കുവയ്ക്കാം. ചിങ്ങപ്പുലരിയിൽ WhatsApp സ്റ്റാറ്റസാക്കാനും, ആശംസകൾ അറിയിക്കാനുമുള്ള സന്ദേശങ്ങളും ഫോട്ടോകളും ഇവിടെ നൽകുന്നു. ഒപ്പം Meta AI, ചാറ്റ്ജിപിടി, കാൻവ എഐയിലൂടെ ആശംസാ ഫോട്ടോകൾ ക്രിയേറ്റ് ചെയ്യാനും വിശദീകരിക്കുന്നു.Happy New Year Wishes 2025 in Malayalamഗൃഹാതുര സ്മരണകളുമായി പുതുവർഷവും പൊന്നോണവും വരവായി, ലോകമെമ്പാടുമുള്ള മലയാളികൾക്ക് പുതുവത്സരാശംസകൾwindow.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {function loadVdoScriptOnce() { (function (v, d, o, ai) { ai = d.createElement('script'); ai.defer = true; ai.async = true; ai.src = v.location.protocol + o; d.head.appendChild(ai); })(window, document, '//a.vdo.ai/core/v-digit-in/vdo.ai.js'); window.removeEventListener('scroll', loadVdoScriptOnce);}window.addEventListener('scroll', loadVdoScriptOnce);});ചിങ്ങം പ്രതീക്ഷയുടെയും പുതിയ തുടക്കങ്ങളുടെയും മാസമാണ്. എല്ലാവർക്കും ഹൃദയം നിറഞ്ഞ ആശംസകൾ നേരുന്നു.സമ്പന്നതയുടെ നിറപറയാകട്ടെ നിങ്ങളുടെ ജീവിതവും മനസ്സും, പുതുവത്സരാശംസകൾ...ഇന്ന് ചിങ്ങം 1. സന്തോഷമുള്ള മനസ്സും, സമ്പന്നമായ ആരോഗ്യവും, ഐശ്വര്യപൂർണമായ...

title: NYSEアーカ、グレースケールの「ドージコイン(DOGE)投資信託」をETFとして上場申請(あたらしい経済)
Dramatic Transfer of 26 Cartel Members to US: Mexico's Bold Move
creator: Kay Lee
content: In a historic and daring execution of cross-border cooperation, Mexico has sent 26 high-ranking cartel figures to the United States as part of the latest significant deal with the Trump administration. This action marks a pivotal moment in the ongoing battle against organized crime, the cross-border drug trade, and violence. A Coalition against Crime The extradition highlights the conjoined efforts of Mexico and the United States against notorious criminal organizations. As stated in www.cbsnews.com , Mexican Security Minister Omar García Harfuch emphasized that these transfers are crucial in safeguarding public safety and dismantling the pervasive influence of criminal networks. A New Chapter in US-Mexico Relations President Claudia Sheinbaum, facing pressure from the Trump administration, declared the transfer as a sovereign decision. However, it aligns with the wider context of ongoing negotiations and the Trump administration’s keen focus on cartel dismantlement as a Justice Department priority. Structural Changes in Cartel Strategies Among those extradited is Abigael González Valencia, a key figure in “Los Cuinis,” linked closely with the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG). This organization, renowned for its brutality and extensive drug trafficking into the U.S., continues to pose significant challenges to authorities on both sides of the border. Notorious Faces of Crime Servando Gómez Martinez, infamously known as “La Tuta,” also features in this extradition. His...

title: El debate migratorio abre un cisma entre Abascal y la Iglesia: "Vox no tiene nada de cristiano; su Dios es blanco, supremacista"
creator: José Ismael Martínez
content: Vox ha topado con la Iglesia. El partido de Abascal está dando rienda suelta a sus discursos contra la inmigración, hasta el punto de que no sólo está siendo investigado por difundir contenidos susceptibles de estigmatizar o incitar a la violencia contra las personas migrantes; sino que algunas autoridades eclesiásticas –como el arzobispo de Tarragona– han salido a condenar un proyecto político que no dudan en tildar de " xenófobo " . "Este partido nunca ha defendido a la Iglesia, sino que se ha servido de ella", asegura a EL ESPAÑOL la reputada teóloga Cristina Inogés . "Han encontrado un filón en el discurso de la migración porque pueden cosechar bastantes votos a base de mentir, partiendo de una ideología que no tiene absolutamente nada de cristiana". "Habría que hacerles ver a estos señores que la figura de Jesucristo no es la que vemos pintada o esculpida: él no era blanco, era palestino . Sin embargo, ellos identifican a una especie de Dios blanco y supremacista y no se dan cuenta de que, en realidad, es humano, no asume ninguna raza, ni país ni identidad geográfica". Inogés ha sido la primera y única española que ha participado en las Asambleas del Sínodo de la Iglesia Católica . Lo hizo en 2022, escogida personalmente por el Papa Francisco . "Lo que hace Vox es hurgar constantemente en la misma herida, no aportar nada nuevo y sobre todo crear conflictos donde no los hay, ante situaciones que nunca han generado problemas. Es una manipulación...

title: Brewers-Red Sox Stunner Just Led To Milwaukee History
creator: Patrick McAvoy
content: With each passing start, the Milwaukee Brewers look more and more smart for the trade they completed early on in the season with the Boston Red Sox for Quinn Priester. Priester essentially was a throwaway in the Red Sox system. Boston had injures in the rotaton and yet the club was willing to part ways with Priester. The deal looks like a steal for Milwaukee. Priester entered Saturday's tilt against the Cincinnati Reds with a 3.49 ERA and 11-2 record. He followed up by going 5 1/3 innings against the Reds and allowed just two earned runs. The 24-year-old came out of the gate hot and improved Milwaukee's streak of consecutive batters retired to 32 to break the franchise record, per MLB.com's Adam McCalvy. "The Brewers' streak of 32 consecutive batters retired is the longest in franchise history, per Elias. The previous club record was 29 in a row in 1998," McCalvy said. Brewers struck gold once again thanks to the Red Sox Milwaukee had a serious need in the starting rotation at the time. Injuries were piling up and around that time Freddy Peralta was the team's only expected starter for the season who was healthy. Priester came to town and immediately became an important piece for the rotation. The former Pittsburgh Pirates first-round pick won't be a free agent until 2031 as well. Milwaukee already is loaded with exciting, young talent. Priester now is in the core as well. The Brewers' front office continues to hit it out of the park and that's why they have been able to...

title: Diễn biến mưa dông ở miền Bắc, miền Trung
creator: Theo Nguyễn Hoài
content: Khu vực phía là trọng tâm đợt mưa dông lần này. Dự báo từ hôm nay đến đêm mai (18/8), khu vực này trời nhiều mây, mưa dông xuất hiện theo từng đợt với cường độ mưa vừa, mưa to đến rất to. Lượng mưa trong thời gian này từ 50-120mm, có nơi trên 150mm, riêng vùng núi từ 30-50mm, có nơi trên 150mm. Sau đó, ngày và đêm 19/8, do ảnh hưởng của hoàn lưu áp thấp nhiệt đới, khu phía Đông Bắc Bộ và Thanh Hóa tiếp tục có mưa vừa, mưa to và dông, cục bộ xuất hiện mưa rất to với lượng mưa phổ biến 30-80mm,có nơi trên 150mm. hôm nay nhiều mây, có mưa, mưa vừa và dông, cục bộ có nơi mưa to đến rất to. Gió đông bắc cấp 2-3. Trong mưa dông có khả năng xảy ra lốc, sét và gió giật mạnh. Nhiệt độ thấp nhất 24-26 độ. Nhiệt độ cao nhất 30-32 độ, có nơi trên 32 độ. Khu vực phía hôm nay có mưa rào và dông rải rác, cục bộ có nơi mưa to. Nhiệt độ thấp nhất 22-25 độ, có nơi dưới 21 độ. Nhiệt độ cao nhất 29-32 độ, có nơi trên 32 độ. Khu vực Đông Bắc Bộ, Thanh Hóa, Nghệ An mưa lớn kéo dài. trong ngày và đêm nay (17/8) cũng có mưa vừa, mưa to với lượng mưa phổ biến 40-90mm, có nơi mưa rất to trên 200mm.
